The Book of Numbers

1 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh in to·the ⁼¬deserted ⁼the·one to·¬Sinai in to·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness in to·one of·the ⁼month of·the ⁼second ⁼year of·second of·coming·out of·them out of·earth ⁼Egypt saying

2 ꜝtake⁺ °¬beginning of·all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬according·to of·¬kindred of·them ¬according·to °houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·them ¬according·to °¬number out of·name of·them ¬according·to °head of·them all virulent

3 off of·twenty·years and ¬above all ⁼the ⁼self-¬departing in to·ability to·Yisra’el ꜝ¬visit⁺·yourselves⁺ °them wiŧh to·ability of·them you and Aharon ꜝ¬visit⁺·yourselves⁺ °them

4 and with of·you⁺ they·will·be·themselves ¬each ¬according·to °¬tribe of·¬each of·¬rulers⁺ ¬according·to °houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ they·will·be·themselves

5 and °these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼men⁺ whos⁺ they·will·¬stand·by·themselves with of·you⁺ of·the·ones⁺ of·¬Reuben Elisour ⁼son Sediour

6 of·the·ones⁺ of·¬Simeon Salamiēl ⁼son Sourisadai

7 of·the·ones⁺ of·Yudah ¬Nahshon ⁼son of·¬Amminadab

8 of·the·ones⁺ of·¬Issachar ¬Nathanael ⁼son Sōgar

9 of·the·ones⁺ of·¬Zebulun Eliab ⁼son Chailōn

10 of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yosef of·the·ones⁺ of·¬Ephraim Elisama ⁼son Emioud of·the·ones⁺ of·¬Manasseh ¬Gamaliel ⁼son Fadassour

11 of·the·ones⁺ of·¬Benjamin Abidan ⁼son Gadeōni

12 of·the·ones⁺ Dan Achiezer ⁼son Amisadai

13 of·the·ones⁺ of·¬Asher Fagaiēl ⁼son Echran

14 of·the·ones⁺ of·¬Gad Elisaf ⁼son Ragouēl

15 of·the·ones⁺ of·¬Naphtali Achire ⁼son Ainan

16 these⁺ ⁼¬selected⁺ of·the ⁼¬synagogue ¬rulers⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ ¬according·to °paternities⁺ ¬military·officers⁺ of·Yisra’el they·are

17 and took Mosheh and Aharon °the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬called·by·name out of·name

18 and °all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue they·¬assembled in to·one of·the ⁼month ⁼the·one of·second ⁼year and ¬??? ¬according·to °genesiss⁺ of·them ¬according·to °paternities⁺ of·them ¬according·to °¬number of·names⁺ of·them off of·twenty·years and ¬above °all ⁼¬male ¬according·to °head of·them

19 °which ⁼¬way ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh and they·were·¬visited in to·the ⁼¬deserted ⁼the·one to·¬Sinai

20 and they·were·generated·themselves the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Reuben ⁼¬firstborn ⁼Yisra’el ¬according·to of·¬kindred of·them ¬according·to °¬peoples⁺ of·them ¬according·to °houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·them ¬according·to °¬number of·names⁺ of·them ¬according·to °head of·them °all⁺ ⁼¬male⁺ off of·twenty·years and ¬above all ⁼the ⁼self-¬departing in to·the ⁼ability

21 the ⁼¬review of·them out of·the ⁼¬tribe of·¬Reuben six and forty thousands⁺ and five·hundred⁺

22 to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Simeon ¬according·to of·¬kindred of·them ¬according·to °¬peoples⁺ of·them ¬according·to °houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·them ¬according·to °¬number of·names⁺ of·them ¬according·to °head of·them °all⁺ ⁼¬male⁺ off of·twenty·years and ¬above all ⁼the ⁼self-¬departing in to·the ⁼ability

23 the ⁼¬review of·them out of·the ⁼¬tribe ⁼¬Simeon nine and fifty thousands⁺ and three·hundred⁺

24 to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yudah ¬according·to of·¬kindred of·them ¬according·to °¬peoples⁺ of·them ¬according·to °houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·them ¬according·to °¬number of·names⁺ of·them ¬according·to °head of·them °all⁺ ⁼¬male⁺ off of·twenty·years and ¬above all ⁼the ⁼self-¬departing in to·the ⁼ability

25 the ⁼¬review of·them out of·the ⁼¬tribe of·Yudah four⁺ and seventy thousands⁺ and six·hundred⁺

26 to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Issachar ¬according·to of·¬kindred of·them ¬according·to °¬peoples⁺ of·them ¬according·to °houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·them ¬according·to °¬number of·names⁺ of·them ¬according·to °head of·them °all⁺ ⁼¬male⁺ off of·twenty·years and ¬above all ⁼the ⁼self-¬departing in to·the ⁼ability

27 the ⁼¬review of·them out of·the ⁼¬tribe of·¬Issachar four⁺ and fifty thousands⁺ and four·hundred⁺

30 to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yosef to·sons⁺ of·¬Ephraim ¬according·to of·¬kindred of·them ¬according·to °¬peoples⁺ of·them ¬according·to °houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·them ¬according·to °¬number of·names⁺ of·them ¬according·to °head of·them °all⁺ ⁼¬male⁺ off of·twenty·years and ¬above all ⁼the ⁼self-¬departing in to·the ⁼ability

41 the ⁼¬review of·them out of·the ⁼¬tribe of·¬Asher one and forty thousands⁺ and five·hundred⁺

42 to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Naphtali ¬according·to of·¬kindred of·them ¬according·to °¬peoples⁺ of·them ¬according·to °houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·them ¬according·to °¬number of·names⁺ of·them ¬according·to °head of·them °all⁺ ⁼¬male⁺ off of·twenty·years and ¬above all ⁼the ⁼self-¬departing in to·the ⁼ability

44 this ⁼the ⁼¬review °which they·¬visited·themselves Mosheh and Aharon and the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·Yisra’el twelve men⁺ man ⁼one ¬according·to °¬tribe ⁼one ¬according·to °¬tribe of·houses⁺ of·paternity they·were

45 and was·generated·himself all ⁼the ⁼¬review of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el wiŧh to·ability of·them off of·twenty·years and ¬above all ⁼the ⁼self-¬departing to·self-¬deploy in to·Yisra’el

46 six·hundred⁺ ⁼thousands⁺ and three·thousand⁺ and five·hundred⁺ and fifty

47 then the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ out of·the ⁼¬tribe ⁼paternity of·them not they·were·¬visited in to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

48 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

49 ꜝsee °the ⁼¬tribe ⁼the·one of·¬Levi not you·will·¬consider·together·yourself and °the ⁼¬number of·them not you·will·take·yourself in to·middle of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

50 and you ꜝ¬approach °the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ upon °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and upon °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·her and upon °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ is in to·her they they·will·¬take·up °the ⁼¬tent and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·her and they they·will·¬minister in to·her and ¬surrounding of·the ⁼¬tent they·will·¬insert·against

51 and in to·the·one to·¬expel °the ⁼¬tent they·will·¬take·down °her the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ and in to·the·one to·¬insert·against °the ⁼¬tent they·will·¬arise and the ⁼¬foreign ⁼the ⁼self-¬approaching ꜝlet·die·off

52 and they·will·¬insert·against the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el man in to·the·one of·himself to·¬order and man ¬according·to °the·one of·himself °¬reign wiŧh to·ability of·them

53 then the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ ꜝlet·them·¬insert·against⁺ ¬in·front·of of·lord ¬surrounding of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and not will·be·himself °¬sin in to·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·will·¬keep the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ they °the ⁼¬prison of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

54 and they·did the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼which⁺ ¬ordered·himself lord to·the ⁼Mosheh and to·Aharon thus they·did

14 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh in to·the ⁼¬deserted of·¬Sinai saying

17 and they·were these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Levi out of·names⁺ of·them Gedsōn Kaath and Merari

18 and these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Gedsōn ¬according·to °¬peoples⁺ of·them Lobeni and ¬Semein

19 and sons⁺ Kaath ¬according·to °¬peoples⁺ of·them Amram and Issaar Chebrōn and Oziēl

20 and sons⁺ Merari ¬according·to °¬peoples⁺ of·them Mooli and Mousi these⁺ they·are ¬peoples⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ ¬according·to °houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·them

26 and °the·ones⁺ ¬shrouds⁺ of·the ⁼¬palace and the ⁼¬curtain of·the ⁼gate ⁼the ⁼¬palace ⁼the ⁼being upon of·the ⁼¬tent and the⁺ ⁼¬remaining⁺ of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him

28 ¬according·to °¬number ⁼all ⁼¬male off of·¬of·a·month and ¬above ¬eight·thousand⁺ and six·hundred⁺ ⁼¬keeping °the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺

29 the⁺ ⁼¬peoples⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Kaath they·will·¬insert·against out of·¬sideways⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent ¬according·to °¬southwest

30 and the ⁼¬ruler of·house of·paternities⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬peoples⁺ of·the Kaath Elisafan ⁼son Oziēl

31 and the ⁼¬prison of·them the ⁼¬ark and the ⁼¬table and the ⁼¬lampstand and the⁺ ⁼¬altars⁺ and the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·the ⁼holy °whatever⁺ they·¬minister in to·them and the ⁼¬overcovering and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·them

32 and the ⁼¬ruler upon of·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ ¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼son of·Aharon ⁼the ⁼priest having·self-¬appointed to·¬keep °the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺

33 to·the Merari ¬people ⁼the Mooli and ¬people ⁼the Mousi these⁺ they·are ¬peoples⁺ Merari

34 the ⁼¬review of·them ¬according·to °¬number °all °¬male off of·¬of·a·month and ¬above six·thousand⁺ and fifty

35 and the ⁼¬ruler of·house of·paternities⁺ of·the ⁼¬people ⁼the Merari Souriēl ⁼son Abichail out of·¬sideways⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent they·will·¬insert·against unto °north

36 the ⁼¬review ⁼the ⁼¬prison of·sons⁺ Merari °the⁺ ⁼¬scrolls⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent and °the⁺ ⁼¬bars⁺ of·her and °the⁺ ⁼pillars⁺ of·her and °the⁺ ⁼¬foots⁺ of·her and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·them

37 and °the⁺ ⁼pillars⁺ of·the ⁼¬palace ¬surrounding and °the⁺ ⁼¬foots⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬pegs⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼beautiful⁺ of·them

38 and the⁺ ⁼¬inserting·against ¬according·to °face of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness off of·¬east Mosheh and Aharon and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him ¬keeping °the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ of·the ⁼holy to °the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and the ⁼¬foreign ⁼the ⁼self-touching will·die·off·himself

39 all ⁼the ⁼¬review of·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ °which⁺ ¬visited·himself Mosheh and Aharon through of·voice of·lord ¬according·to °¬peoples⁺ of·them °all ⁼¬male off of·¬of·a·month and ¬above two and twenty thousands⁺

40 and told lord unto °Mosheh saying ꜝ¬visit·yourself all °¬firstborn ⁼virulent of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el off of·¬of·a·month and ¬above and ꜝtake °the ⁼¬number out of·name

41 and you·will·take·yourself °the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ to·me* I* lord anti of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬firstborn⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ anti of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬firstborn⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

42 and ¬visited·himself Mosheh °which ⁼¬way ¬ordered·himself lord °all ⁼¬firstborn in to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

43 and they·were·generated·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬firstborn⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬male⁺ ¬according·to °¬number out of·name off of·¬of·a·month and ¬above out of·the ⁼¬review of·them two and twenty thousands⁺ three⁺ and seventy and two·hundred⁺

44 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

45 ꜝtake °the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ anti of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬firstborn⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ anti of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·them and they·will·be·themselves to·me* the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ I* lord

46 and °the⁺ ⁼¬ransoms⁺ of·three⁺ and seventy and of·two·hundred⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬increasing ¬from °the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼¬firstborn⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

47 and you·will·take·yourself five °shekels⁺ ¬according·to °head ¬according·to °the ⁼¬two-drachma ⁼the ⁼holy you·will·take·yourself twenty ¬??? of·the ⁼shekel

48 and you·will·give °the ⁼silver to·Aharon and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him °¬ransoms⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬increasing in to·them

49 and took Mosheh °the ⁼silver °the⁺ ⁼¬ransoms⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬increasing to °the·one they·should·¬ransoming of·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺

50 ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼¬firstborn⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el took °the ⁼silver °thousand⁺ ⁼three·hundred⁺ sixty five °shekels⁺ ¬according·to °the ⁼shekel ⁼the ⁼holy

51 and gave Mosheh °the⁺ ⁼¬ransoms⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬increasing to·Aharon and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him through of·voice of·lord °which ⁼¬way ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

4 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh and °Aharon saying

2 ꜝtake °the ⁼¬sum of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Kaath out of·middle of·sons⁺ of·¬Levi ¬according·to °¬peoples⁺ of·them ¬according·to °houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·them

3 off twenty and five of·years⁺ and ¬above and ¬until fifty of·years⁺ all ⁼the ⁼self-¬entering to·¬minister to·do °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ in to·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

4 and °these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Kaath in to·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness °holy of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺

5 and will·come·to·himself Aharon and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him ¬when should·¬expel the ⁼¬barracks and they·will·¬take·down °the ⁼¬curtain ⁼the ⁼¬overshadowing and they·will·¬cover in to·it °the ⁼¬ark of·the ⁼witness

6 and they·will·¬put upon °it ⁼¬overcovering ⁼leather ⁼hyacinth and they·will·¬put·on upon °her °cloak ⁼¬all ⁼hyacinth ¬from·above and they·will·¬insert °the⁺ ⁼¬bearing·poles⁺

7 and upon °the ⁼¬table ⁼the ⁼self-¬setting·before they·will·¬put·on upon °her °cloak ⁼¬entirely·of·purple and °the⁺ ⁼¬bowls⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬incense·pans⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬cups⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬libation·bowls⁺ in to·which⁺ ¬pours·a·libation and the⁺ ⁼breads⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ through of·all upon of·her they·will·be·themselves

8 and they·will·¬put·on upon °her °cloak ⁼¬scarlet and they·will·¬cover °her to·¬veil ⁼leather ⁼hyacinth and they·will·¬insert through of·her °the⁺ ⁼¬bearing·poles⁺

9 and they·will·take·themselves °cloak ⁼hyacinth and they·will·¬cover °the ⁼¬lampstand ⁼the ⁼lighting and °the⁺ ⁼¬lamps⁺ of·her and °the⁺ ⁼¬tongs⁺ of·her and °the⁺ ⁼¬oil·funnels⁺ of·her and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬jars⁺ of·the ⁼¬olive·oil to·which⁺ they·¬minister in to·them

10 and they·will·throw·in °her and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·her to °¬veil ⁼leather ⁼hyacinth and they·will·¬put °her upon of·¬bearing·poles⁺

11 and upon °the ⁼¬altar ⁼the ⁼golden they·will·¬cover °cloak ⁼hyacinth and they·will·¬cover °it to·¬veil ⁼leather ⁼hyacinth and they·will·¬insert °the⁺ ⁼¬bearing·poles⁺ of·it

12 and they·will·take·themselves °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬ministering⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ they·¬minister in to·them in to·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and they·will·throw·in to °cloak ⁼hyacinth and they·will·¬cover °them to·¬veil ⁼leather ⁼hyacinth and they·will·¬put upon °¬bearing·poles⁺

13 and °the ⁼¬lid will·¬put upon °the ⁼¬altar and they·will·¬cover upon °it ⁼cloak ⁼¬entirely·of·purple

14 and they·will·¬put upon °it °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ to·whatever⁺ they·¬minister upon °it in to·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬censers⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬meat·hooks⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬bowls⁺ and °the ⁼¬lid and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·the ⁼¬altar and they·will·¬put·on upon °it ⁼¬veil ⁼leather ⁼hyacinth and they·will·¬insert °the·ones⁺ ¬bearing·poles⁺ of·it and they·will·take·themselves °cloak ⁼purple and they·will·¬conceal °the ⁼¬bathing·tub and °the ⁼¬foot of·it and they·will·throw·in °them to °¬veil ⁼leather ⁼hyacinth and they·will·¬put upon ¬bearing·poles⁺

15 and they·will·¬complete Aharon and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him ¬covering °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ in to·the·one to·¬expel °the ⁼¬barracks and with °these⁺ they·will·come·to·themselves sons⁺ Kaath to·¬take·up and not they·will·touch·themselves of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ so·that ńot they·should·die·off °these⁺ they·will·¬take·up the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Kaath in to·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

16 ¬overseer ⁼¬Eleazar ⁼son of·Aharon ⁼the ⁼priest the ⁼¬olive·oil of·the ⁼light and the ⁼¬incense of·the ⁼¬composition and the ⁼¬sacrifice ⁼the·one ¬according·to °day and the ⁼¬olive·oil of·the ⁼¬anointing the ⁼¬oversight of·¬all ⁼the ⁼¬tent and whatever⁺ is in to·her in to·the ⁼holy in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺

17 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh and °Aharon saying

18 ńot you⁺·should·¬destroy of·the ⁼¬tribe °the ⁼¬people ⁼the Kaath out of·middle of·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺

19 °this ꜝdo⁺ to·them and they·will·live·themselves and not ńot they·should·die·off of·self-¬approaching of·them unto °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ Aharon and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him ꜝlet·them·¬approach⁺·themselves and they·will·¬appoint °them °¬each ¬according·to °the ⁼¬offering of·him

20 and not ńot they·should·come·to to·see ¬suddenly °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and they·will·die·off·themselves

21 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

22 ꜝtake °the ⁼¬beginning of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Gedsōn and °these⁺ ¬according·to °houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·them ¬according·to °¬peoples⁺ of·them

23 off ¬??? and ¬above ¬until of·fifty·years ꜝ¬visit·yourself °them all ⁼the ⁼self-¬entering to·¬minister and to·do °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·him in to·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

24 this ⁼the ⁼¬ministry of·the ⁼¬people ⁼the Gedsōn to·¬minister and to·¬take·up

25 and will·¬take·up °the⁺ ⁼¬hide·coverings⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent and °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and °the ⁼¬veil of·her and °the ⁼¬veil ⁼the ⁼hyacinth ⁼the ⁼being upon of·her ¬from·above and °the ⁼¬veil of·the ⁼¬door ⁼the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

48 and they·were·been·generated the⁺ ⁼¬visited ⁼¬eight·thousand⁺ ⁼five·hundred⁺ eighty

49 through of·voice of·lord ¬visited·himself °them in to·hand of·Mosheh °man ¬according·to °man upon of·the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·them and upon of·which⁺ they·¬take·up they and they·were·¬visited °which ⁼¬way ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

5 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

2 ꜝ¬order to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and ꜝlet·them·¬send·out⁺ out of·the ⁼¬barracks °all ⁼¬leprous and °all ⁼¬seminal·emission and °all ⁼¬unclean upon to·soul

3 off of·¬male ¬until of·¬female ꜝ¬send·out⁺ out of·the ⁼¬barracks and not ńot they·will·¬stain °the⁺ ⁼¬barrackses⁺ of·them in to·which⁺ I* I·¬occupy·myself in to·them

4 and they·did thus the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·¬sended·out °them out of·the ⁼¬barracks ¬as spoke lord to·the ⁼Mosheh thus they·did the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

5 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

6 ꜝspeak to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el saying ⁼man or woman who ifᵮ should·do off of·the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼human⁺ and ¬ignoring should·¬ignore and should·¬offend the ⁼soul ⁼that

7 will·¬confess °the ⁼sin ⁼which did and will·¬pay °the ⁼¬trespass °the ⁼¬sum and °the ⁼¬fifth·part of·it will·¬add upon °it and will·¬pay to·what ¬offended to·him

8 ifᵮ then ńot should·be to·the ⁼human the ⁼¬·kin ¬so to·¬pay to·him °the ⁼¬trespass unto °him °the ⁼¬trespass ⁼the ⁼self-¬paying to·lord ⁼the ⁼priest will·be·himself ¬but of·the ⁼¬ram ⁼the ⁼¬propitiation through of·which will·¬appease·himself in to·him about of·him

9 and all ⁼¬firstfruits ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-making·holy in to·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °whatever⁺ iᵮ they·should·¬bring·to to·the ⁼lord ⁼the ⁼priest to·him will·be·himself

10 and of·¬each °the⁺ ⁼having·self-made·holy of·him will·be·himself man ⁼which ifᵮ should·give to·the ⁼priest to·him will·be·himself

11 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

12 ꜝspeak to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and you·will·¬say unto °them of·man ⁼man ifᵮ should·¬transgress the ⁼woman of·him and should·¬attend·upon °him ¬overlooking

13 and should·be·¬slept whatever with of·her °¬bed of·seed and should·¬be·hidden out of·eyes⁺ of·the ⁼man of·her and should·¬hide she then should·be having·self-¬stained and witness ńot was with of·her and she ńot should·be having·self-¬seized

14 and should·¬arrive to·him breath of·¬jealousy and should·be·zealous °the ⁼woman of·him she then has·¬stained·himself or should·¬arrive to·him breath of·¬jealousy and should·be·zealous °the ⁼woman of·him she then ńot should·be having·self-¬stained

15 and will·¬bring the ⁼human °the ⁼woman of·him unto °the ⁼priest and will·¬bring·to °the ⁼¬gift about of·her °the ⁼tenth of·the ⁼¬ephah °¬flour ⁼¬barley not will·¬pour·on upon °it ⁼¬olive·oil not·then will·¬put upon °it °¬frankincense is for ¬sacrifice of·¬jealousy ¬sacrifice of·¬memorial ¬reminding °sin

16 and will·¬bring·near °her the ⁼priest and will·stand °her ¬before of·lord

17 and will·take·himself the ⁼priest °water ⁼¬clean ⁼living in to·¬jar ⁼¬clay and of·the ⁼earth ⁼the ⁼being upon of·the ⁼¬ground of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and taking ⁼the ⁼priest will·throw·in to °the ⁼water

18 and will·stand the ⁼priest °the ⁼woman ¬before of·lord and will·¬reveal °the ⁼head of·the ⁼woman and will·give upon °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·her °the ⁼¬sacrifice of·the ⁼¬memorial °the ⁼¬sacrifice of·the ⁼¬jealousy in then to·the ⁼hand of·the ⁼priest will·be·himself °the ⁼water of·the ⁼¬rebuke ⁼the ⁼self-¬accursing ⁼this

19 and will·¬adjure °her the ⁼priest and will·¬say to·the ⁼woman if ńot has·¬slept·himself whatever with of·you if ńot you·have·¬transgressed to·be·¬stained ¬by °the ⁼man ⁼the·one of·yourself ¬innocent ꜝbe off of·the ⁼water of·the ⁼¬rebuke ⁼the ⁼self-¬accursing ⁼this

20 if then you you·have·¬transgressed ¬by of·man being or you·have·¬stained·yourself and gave whatever °the ⁼¬bed of·him in to·you ¬but of·the ⁼man of·you

21 and will·¬adjure the ⁼priest °the ⁼woman in to·the⁺ ⁼¬oaths⁺ of·the ⁼¬curse ⁼this and will·¬say the ⁼priest to·the ⁼woman may·give lord °you in to·¬curse and °¬affirmation in to·middle of·the ⁼people of·you in to·the·one to·give °lord ⁼the ⁼¬thigh of·you °having·¬failed and °the ⁼¬belly of·you °having·self-¬bloated

22 and will·come·to·himself °the ⁼water ⁼the ⁼self-¬accursing ⁼this to °the ⁼¬belly of·you to·¬bloat °¬belly and to·¬fail °¬thigh of·you and will·¬say the ⁼woman may·be·generated·himself may·be·generated·himself

23 and will·write the ⁼priest °the⁺ ⁼¬curses⁺ ⁼these⁺ to °¬scroll and will·¬blot·out to °the ⁼water of·the ⁼¬rebuke ⁼the ⁼self-¬accursing

24 and will·¬water °the ⁼woman °the ⁼water of·the ⁼¬rebuke ⁼the ⁼self-¬accursing and will·come·to·himself to °her °the ⁼water ⁼the ⁼self-¬accursing of·the ⁼¬rebuke

25 and will·take·himself the ⁼priest out of·hand ⁼the ⁼woman °the ⁼¬sacrifice of·the ⁼¬jealousy and will·¬put °the ⁼¬sacrifice ¬before of·lord and will·¬bring·to °her unto °the ⁼¬altar

26 and will·¬catch·himself the ⁼priest off of·the ⁼¬sacrifice °the ⁼¬memorial of·her and will·¬carry·up °it upon °the ⁼¬altar and with °these⁺ will·¬water °the ⁼woman °the ⁼water

27 and will·be·himself ifᵮ should·be having·self-¬stained and to·¬forgetfulness should·¬be·hidden °the ⁼man of·her and will·come·to·himself to °her °the ⁼water of·the ⁼¬rebuke °the ⁼self-¬accursing and will·be·¬bloated °the ⁼¬belly and will·¬fail·himself the ⁼¬thigh of·her and will·be·himself the ⁼woman to °¬curse in to·the ⁼people of·her

28 ifᵮ then ńot should·be·¬stained the ⁼woman and ¬clean should·be and ¬innocent will·be·himself and will·¬produce·offspring °seed

29 this ⁼the ⁼law of·the ⁼¬jealousy to·which ifᵮ should·¬transgress the ⁼woman ¬by of·man being and should·be·¬stained

30 or human to·which ifᵮ should·¬arrive upon °him breath of·¬jealousy and should·be·zealous °the ⁼woman of·him and will·stand °the ⁼woman of·him ¬before of·lord and will·do to·her the ⁼priest °all ⁼the ⁼law ⁼this

31 and ¬innocent will·be·himself the ⁼human off of·sin and the ⁼woman ⁼that will·take·himself °the ⁼sin of·her

6 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

2 ꜝspeak to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and you·will·¬say unto °them man or woman which ifᵮ ¬greatly should·¬pray·himself °¬vow to·self-¬purify °¬purity to·lord

3 off of·wine and °¬alcoholic·drink will·be·¬purified off of·wine and °¬vinegar out of·wine and °¬vinegar out °¬alcoholic·drink not will·drink·himself and °whatever⁺ ¬workouts·himself out of·¬grape not will·drink·himself and °¬grape ⁼¬new and °¬dried·grape not will·¬eat·himself

4 °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼¬vow of·him off of·all⁺ °whatever⁺ is·generated·himself out of·vine °wine off of·¬dregses⁺ ¬until of·¬grape-stone not will·¬eat·himself

5 °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼¬vow of·the ⁼¬purification ¬razor not will·¬arrive·himself upon °the ⁼head of·him ¬until iᵮ they·should·be·¬fulfilled the⁺ ⁼days⁺ °whatever⁺ ¬prayed·himself to·lord holy will·be·himself ¬feeding °¬hair ⁼hair of·head

6 °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼¬vow to·lord upon to·all ⁼soul ⁼having·¬deceased not will·come·to·himself

7 upon to·father and upon to·mother and upon to·brother and upon to·sister not will·be·¬stained upon to·them of·dying·off of·them ¬that ¬vow of·God of·him upon to·him upon of·head of·him

8 °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼¬vow of·him holy will·be·himself to·lord

9 ifᵮ then whatever should·die·off ¬suddenly upon to·him ¬instantly will·be·¬stained the ⁼head of·¬vow of·him and will·¬shave·himself °the ⁼head of·him to·which iᵮ to·day should·be·¬cleaned to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh will·be·¬shaved

10 and to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼eighth will·¬bear two °pigeons⁺ or two °¬nestlings⁺ of·doves⁺ unto °the ⁼priest upon °the·ones⁺ of·¬door ⁼the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

11 and will·do the ⁼priest °one about of·sin and °one to °¬burnt·offering and will·¬appease·himself about of·him the ⁼priest about of·which⁺ sinned about of·the ⁼soul and will·make·holy °the ⁼head of·him in to·that ⁼the ⁼day

12 ⁼which was·made·holy to·lord °the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼¬vow and will·¬bring·near °¬lamb ⁼¬of·a·year to °¬trespass and the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬before⁺ ¬unreasonable⁺ they·will·be·themselves ¬that was·¬stained head of·¬vow of·him

13 and this ⁼the ⁼law of·the ⁼self-¬praying to·which iᵮ to·day should·¬fulfill °days⁺ of·¬vow of·him will·¬bring·to he ¬from °the⁺ ⁼¬doors⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

14 and will·¬bring·near °the ⁼¬gift of·him to·lord °¬lamb ⁼¬of·a·year ⁼¬blameless ⁼one to °¬bringing·of·a·whole·burnt-offering and °¬ewe-lamb ⁼¬of·a·year ⁼¬blameless ⁼one to °sin and °¬ram ⁼one ⁼¬blameless to °¬saving

15 and °¬bin of·¬unleavened⁺ of·¬fine·flour °breads⁺ ⁼having·been·¬prepared in to·¬olive·oil and °¬pancakes⁺ ⁼¬unleavened⁺ ⁼having·self-christened in to·¬olive·oil and ¬sacrifice of·them and ¬libation of·them

16 and will·¬bring·to the ⁼priest ¬before of·lord and will·do °the·one about of·sin of·him and °the ⁼¬burnt·offering of·him

17 and °the ⁼¬ram will·do °¬sacrifice of·¬saving to·lord upon to·the ⁼¬bin of·the⁺ ⁼¬unleavened⁺ and will·do the ⁼priest °the ⁼¬sacrifice of·him and °the ⁼¬libation of·him

18 and will·¬shave·himself the ⁼having·self-¬prayed ¬from °the⁺ ⁼¬doors⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness °the ⁼head of·the ⁼¬vow of·him and will·¬put °the⁺ ⁼hair⁺ upon °the ⁼fire which is ¬by °the ⁼¬sacrifice of·the·one of·¬saving

19 and will·take·himself the ⁼priest °the ⁼arm ⁼¬cooked off of·the ⁼¬ram and °bread ⁼one ⁼¬unleavened off of·the ⁼¬bin and °¬pancake ⁼¬unleavened ⁼one and will·¬put upon °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·the ⁼having·self-¬prayed with °the·one to·self-¬shave °him °the ⁼¬vow of·him

20 and will·¬bring·to °them the ⁼priest °¬lid ¬before of·lord °holy will·be·himself to·the ⁼priest upon of·the ⁼¬breast ⁼the ⁼¬lid and upon of·the ⁼arm of·the ⁼¬choice·portion and with °these⁺ will·drink·himself the ⁼having·self-¬prayed °wine

21 this ⁼the ⁼law of·the ⁼self-¬praying which iᵮ should·¬pray·himself to·lord °¬gift of·him to·lord about of·the ⁼¬vow ¬without of·which⁺ iᵮ should·find the ⁼hand of·him ¬according·to °ability of·the ⁼¬vow of·him °which iᵮ should·¬pray·himself ¬according·to °law of·¬purity

22 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

23 ꜝspeak to·Aharon and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him saying thus you⁺·will·¬praise °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el saying to·them and they·will·¬put °the ⁼name of·me upon °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and I* lord I·will·¬praise °them

24 may·¬praise °you lord and may·¬keep °you

25 may·¬appear lord °the ⁼face of·him upon °you and may·¬have·mercy °you

26 may·¬lift·up lord °the ⁼face of·him upon °you and may·give to·you °peace

7 and was·generated·himself to·which ⁼day ¬completed Mosheh ¬so to·¬arise °the ⁼¬tent and christened °her and made·holy °her and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·her and °the ⁼¬altar and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ of·it and christened °them and made·holy °them

2 and they·¬brought·to the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·Yisra’el twelve ¬rulers⁺ of·houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·them these⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·¬tribes⁺ these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬stood·by upon of·the ⁼¬oversight

3 and they·¬bore °the⁺ ⁼¬gifts⁺ of·them ¬before of·lord six °¬wagons⁺ ⁼¬like·a·covered·chariot⁺ and twelve °¬oxes⁺ °¬wagon ¬from two of·¬rulers⁺ and °calf ¬from of·¬each and they·¬brought·near ¬in·front·of of·the ⁼¬tent

4 and told lord unto °Mosheh saying

5 ꜝtake ¬from of·them and they·will·be·themselves unto °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬ministering⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and you·will·give °them to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ to·¬each ¬according·to °the·one of·him °¬ministry

6 and taking ⁼Mosheh °the⁺ ⁼¬wagons⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ gave °them to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺

7 °the·ones⁺ two °¬wagons⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼four⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ gave to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Gedsōn ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬ministries⁺ of·them

8 and °the·ones⁺ °four⁺ °¬wagons⁺ and °the·ones⁺ eight °¬oxes⁺ gave to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Merari ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬ministries⁺ of·them through Ithamar ⁼son ⁼Aharon ⁼the ⁼priest

9 and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Kaath not gave ¬that °the⁺ ⁼¬ministrations⁺ of·the ⁼holy they·have upon of·shoulders⁺ they·will·¬take·up

10 and they·¬brought·to the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ to °the ⁼¬dedication of·the ⁼¬altar in to·the ⁼day ⁼which christened °it and they·¬brought·to the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬gifts⁺ of·them ¬opposite of·the ⁼¬altar

84 this ⁼the ⁼¬dedication of·the ⁼¬altar to·which ⁼day christened °it ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬bowls⁺ ⁼silver⁺ twelve ¬bowls⁺ ⁼silver⁺ twelve ¬incense·pans⁺ ⁼golden⁺ twelve

85 thirty and hundred of·shekels⁺ the ⁼¬bowl ⁼the ⁼one and seventy of·shekels⁺ the ⁼¬bowl ⁼the ⁼one all ⁼the ⁼silver of·the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ two·thousand⁺ and four·hundred⁺ ⁼shekels⁺ in to·the ⁼shekel to·the ⁼holy

87 all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ to °¬bringing·of·a·whole·burnt-offering calves⁺ twelve ¬rams⁺ twelve ¬lambs⁺ ⁼¬of·a·year⁺ twelve and the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼¬libations⁺ of·them and ¬1·winter·yearlings⁺ out of·¬goats⁺ twelve about of·sin

88 all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ to °¬sacrifice of·¬saving ¬heifers⁺ twenty four⁺ ⁼¬rams⁺ sixty ¬he-goats⁺ sixty ¬ewe-lambs⁺ sixty ¬of·a·year⁺ ⁼¬blameless⁺ this ⁼the ⁼¬dedication of·the ⁼¬altar with °the·one to·¬fulfill °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·him and with °the·one to·christen °him

89 in to·the·one to·self-¬enter °Mosheh to °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness to·speak to·him and heard °the ⁼voice of·lord ⁼speaking unto °him ¬from·above of·the ⁼¬propitiation which is upon of·the ⁼¬ark of·the ⁼witness ¬each °middle of·the·ones⁺ two of·¬Cherubs⁺ and spoke unto °him

8 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

2 ꜝspeak to·the ⁼Aharon and you·will·¬say unto °him ¬when you·should·¬put °the⁺ ⁼¬lamps⁺ out of·¬part ¬according·to °face of·the ⁼¬lampstand they·will·light the·ones⁺ seven ¬lamps⁺

3 and did thus Aharon out of·the ⁼one ⁼¬part ¬according·to °face of·the ⁼¬lampstand ¬lit·up °the⁺ ⁼¬lamps⁺ of·her ¬as ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

4 and this ⁼the ⁼¬apparatus of·the ⁼¬lampstand ¬strong ⁼golden the ⁼¬stem of·her and the⁺ ⁼¬lilies⁺ of·her ¬strong ⁼¬all ¬according·to °the ⁼¬appearance which ¬showed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh thus did °the ⁼¬lampstand

5 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

6 ꜝtake °the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ out of·middle of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and you·will·¬purify °them

7 and thus you·will·do to·them °the ⁼¬purification of·them you·will·¬sprinkle·about °them water of·¬purification and will·¬arrive·himself °¬razor upon °all ⁼the ⁼body of·them and they·will·¬wash °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·them and ¬clean⁺ they·will·be·themselves

8 and they·will·take·themselves °calf ⁼one out of·¬oxes⁺ and of·this °¬sacrifice of·¬fine·flour °having·been·¬prepared in to·¬olive·oil and °calf ⁼¬of·a·year out of·¬oxes⁺ you·will·take·yourself about of·sin

9 and you·will·¬bring·near °the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ ¬before of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and you·will·¬assemble °all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

10 and you·will·¬bring·near °the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ ¬before of·lord and they·will·¬put the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them upon °the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺

11 and will·¬separate Aharon °the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ °¬gift ¬before of·lord ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·will·be·themselves ¬so to·self-work °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·lord

12 then the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ they·will·¬put °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ upon °the⁺ ⁼heads⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼calves⁺ and will·do °the ⁼one about of·sin and °the ⁼one to °¬burnt·offering to·lord to·self-¬appease about of·them

13 and you·will·stand °the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ ¬before of·lord and ¬before of·Aharon and ¬before of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and you·will·¬pay °them °¬gift ¬before of·lord

14 and you·will·¬give·orders °the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ out of·middle of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·will·be·themselves to·me*

15 and with °these⁺ they·will·come·to·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ to·self-work °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and you·will·¬clean °them and you·will·¬pay °them ¬before of·lord

16 ¬that ¬gift having·self-¬payed ⁼these⁺ to·me they·are out of·middle of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el anti of·the⁺ ⁼¬opening·up °all ⁼motherhood of·¬firstborn⁺ ⁼all⁺ out of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el I·have·taken °them to·me*

17 ¬that to·me* °all ⁼¬firstborn in to·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el off of·human ¬until of·¬animal to·which ⁼day I·¬struck °all ⁼¬firstborn in to·earth ⁼Egypt I·made·holy °them to·me*

18 and they·took °the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ anti of·all ⁼¬firstborn in to·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

19 and I·¬payed °the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ °¬gift °having·self-given to·Aharon and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him out of·middle of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·self-work °the⁺ ⁼works⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el in to·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and to·self-¬appease about of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and not will·be·himself in to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬approaching unto °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺

20 and did Mosheh and Aharon and all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ ¬as ¬ordered·himself lord to·the ⁼Mosheh about of·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ thus they·did to·them the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

21 and they·¬purified·themselves the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ and they·¬washed·themselves °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ and ¬payed °them Aharon °¬gift ¬before of·lord and ¬appeased·himself about of·them Aharon to·self-¬purify °them

22 and with °these⁺ they·came·to the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ to·¬minister °the ⁼¬ministry of·them in to·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness ¬before of·Aharon and ¬before of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him ¬as ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh about of·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ thus they·did to·them

23 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

24 this is the·one about of·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ off ¬??? and ¬above they·will·come·to·themselves to·¬be·active in to·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

25 and off of·fifty·years will·¬leave·himself off of·the ⁼¬ministry and not will·work·himself still

26 and will·¬minister the ⁼brother of·him in to·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness to·¬keep °¬prisons⁺ °works⁺ then not will·work·himself thus you·will·do to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ of·them

9 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh in to·the ⁼¬deserted of·¬Sinai in to·the ⁼year ⁼the ⁼second of·coming·out of·them out of·earth ⁼Egypt in to·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼first saying

2 ꜝtell and ꜝlet·them·do⁺ the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °the ⁼¬Passover·lamb ¬according·to °hour of·it

3 to·the ⁼four-and-tenth ⁼day of·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼first unto °¬evening you·will·do °it ¬according·to °¬times⁺ ¬according·to °the ⁼law of·it and ¬according·to °the ⁼¬amalgamation of·him you·will·do °it

4 and spoke Mosheh to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·do °the ⁼¬Passover·lamb

5 of·self-¬begining to·the ⁼four-and-tenth ⁼day of·the ⁼month in to·the ⁼¬deserted of·the·one of·¬Sinai ¬as ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh thus they·did the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

6 and they·¬came·themselves the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼which⁺ they·were ¬unclean⁺ upon to·soul of·human and not they·were·able·themselves to·do °the ⁼¬Passover·lamb in to·the ⁼day ⁼that and they·came·unto ¬in·front·of of·Mosheh and of·Aharon in to·that ⁼the ⁼day

7 and they·told the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼those⁺ unto °him we ¬unclean⁺ upon to·soul of·human ńot therefore we·should·¬lack to·¬bring·to °the ⁼¬gift to·lord ¬according·to °¬time of·him in to·middle of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

8 and told unto °them Mosheh ꜝstand⁺ ¬there and I·will·hear·myself °what ¬orders·himself lord about of·you⁺

9 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

10 ꜝspeak to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el saying ⁼human ⁼human ⁼which ifᵮ should·be·generated·himself ¬unclean upon to·soul of·human or in to·¬road ¬far to·you⁺ or in to·the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·you⁺ and will·do °the ⁼¬Passover·lamb to·lord

11 in to·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼second in to·the ⁼four-and-tenth ⁼day °the·one unto °¬evening they·will·do °it upon of·¬unleavened⁺ and of·¬bitter·herbs⁺ they·will·¬eat·themselves °it

12 not they·will·¬leave·behind off of·him to °the·one ¬early and °bone not they·will·¬break off of·him ¬according·to °the ⁼law of·the ⁼¬Passover·lamb they·will·do °it

13 and human ⁼which ifᵮ ¬clean should·be and in to·¬road ⁼¬long not is and should·¬lack to·do °the ⁼¬Passover·lamb will·be·¬rooted·out the ⁼soul ⁼that out of·the ⁼people of·her ¬that °the ⁼¬gift to·lord not ¬brought·to ¬according·to °the ⁼¬time of·him °sin of·him will·take·himself the ⁼human ⁼that

14 ifᵮ then should·come·unto unto °you⁺ ¬proselyte in to·the ⁼earth of·you⁺ and will·do °the ⁼¬Passover·lamb to·lord ¬according·to °the ⁼law of·the ⁼¬Passover·lamb and ¬according·to °the ⁼¬rate of·him will·do °it law ⁼one will·be·himself to·you⁺ and to·the ⁼¬proselyte and to·the·one to·¬native-born of·the ⁼earth

15 and to·the ⁼day ⁼which was·stood the ⁼¬tent ¬covered the ⁼cloud °the ⁼¬tent °the ⁼house of·the ⁼witness and °the·one of·¬evening was upon of·the ⁼¬tent as ¬appearance of·fire ¬until ¬early

16 thus was·generated·himself through of·all the ⁼cloud ¬covered °her °days⁺ and ¬appearance of·fire °the ⁼night

17 and ¬when ¬ascended the ⁼cloud off of·the ⁼¬tent and with °these⁺ they·¬took·away the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and in to·the ⁼¬place ¬whither iᵮ stood the ⁼cloud there they·¬inserted·against the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

18 through of·¬order of·lord they·will·¬insert·against the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and through of·¬order of·lord they·will·¬take·away °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼days⁺ in to·which⁺ ¬shades the ⁼cloud upon of·the ⁼¬tent they·will·¬insert·against the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

19 and ¬when should·¬drag·upon·himself the ⁼cloud upon of·the ⁼¬tent °days⁺ ⁼¬greater⁺ and they·will·¬keep·themselves the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °the ⁼¬prison of·the ⁼God and not ńot they·should·¬expel

21 and will·be·himself ¬when should·be·generated·himself the ⁼cloud off of·¬evening ¬until ¬early and should·¬ascend the ⁼cloud °the·one ¬early and they·will·¬take·away of·day or of·night

22 of·month of·day ⁼¬increasing ⁼the ⁼cloud ⁼¬shading upon of·her they·will·¬insert·against the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and not ńot they·should·¬take·away

23 ¬that through of·¬order of·lord they·will·¬take·away °the ⁼¬prison of·lord they·¬kept·themselves through of·¬order of·lord in to·hand of·Mosheh

10 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

2 ꜝdo to·yourself two °trumpets⁺ ⁼silver⁺ ⁼¬hammered·outs⁺ you·will·do °them and they·will·be·themselves to·you to·¬call·by·name °the ⁼¬synagogue and to·¬expel °the⁺ ⁼¬barrackses⁺

3 and you·will·trumpet in to·them and will·be·¬assembled all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue upon °the ⁼¬door of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

4 ifᵮ then in to·one they·should·trumpet they·will·come·unto·themselves unto °you all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ ⁼¬founders⁺ of·Yisra’el

5 and you⁺·will·trumpet °¬cheer and they·will·¬expel the⁺ ⁼¬barrackses⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬inserting·against °¬easts⁺

6 and you⁺·will·trumpet °¬cheer ⁼second and they·will·¬expel the⁺ ⁼¬barrackses⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬inserting·against °¬southwest and you⁺·will·trumpet °¬cheer ⁼third and they·will·¬expel the⁺ ⁼¬barrackses⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬inserting·against ¬from °sea and you⁺·will·trumpet °¬cheer ⁼fourth and they·will·¬expel the⁺ ⁼¬barrackses⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬inserting·against unto °north to·¬cheer they·will·trumpet in to·the ⁼¬departure of·them

7 and ¬when you⁺·should·¬assemble °the ⁼¬synagogue you⁺·will·trumpet and not to·¬cheer

8 and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Aharon the⁺ ⁼priests⁺ they·will·trumpet to·the⁺ ⁼trumpets⁺ and will·be·himself to·you⁺ law ⁼eternal to °the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·you⁺

9 ifᵮ then you⁺·should·come·out to °war in to·the ⁼earth of·you⁺ unto °the⁺ ⁼¬opposed⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·¬opposed to·you⁺ and you⁺·will·signify to·the⁺ ⁼trumpets⁺ and you⁺·will·be·¬reminded ¬before of·lord and you⁺·will·be·¬saved off of·the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·you⁺

10 and in to·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·the ⁼¬joy of·you⁺ and in to·the⁺ ⁼¬festivals⁺ of·you⁺ and in to·the⁺ ⁼young·moons⁺ of·you⁺ you⁺·will·trumpet to·the⁺ ⁼trumpets⁺ upon to·the⁺ ⁼¬burnt·offerings⁺ and upon to·the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·the·ones⁺ of·¬savings⁺ of·you⁺ and will·be·himself to·you⁺ ¬remembrance ¬before of·the ⁼God of·you⁺ I* lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you⁺

11 and was·generated·himself in to·the ⁼¬year ⁼the ⁼second in to·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼second to·¬twentieth·day of·the ⁼month ¬ascended the ⁼cloud off of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

12 and they·¬expelled the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el wiŧh to·¬chattels⁺ of·them in to·the ⁼¬deserted of·¬Sinai and stood the ⁼cloud in to·the ⁼¬deserted of·the Faran

13 and they·¬expelled first⁺ through of·voice of·lord in to·hand of·Mosheh

14 and they·¬expelled °¬order of·¬barracks of·sons⁺ of·Yudah first⁺ wiŧh to·ability of·them and upon of·the ⁼ability of·them ¬Nahshon ⁼son of·¬Amminadab

15 and upon of·the ⁼ability ⁼¬tribe of·sons⁺ of·¬Issachar ¬Nathanael ⁼son Sōgar

16 and upon of·the ⁼ability ⁼¬tribe of·sons⁺ of·¬Zebulun Eliab ⁼son Chailōn

17 and they·will·¬take·down °the ⁼¬tent and they·will·¬expel the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Gedsōn and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Merari ¬taking·up °the ⁼¬tent

18 and they·¬expelled °¬order of·¬barracks of·¬Reuben wiŧh to·ability of·them and upon of·the ⁼ability of·them Elisour ⁼son Sediour

19 and upon of·the ⁼ability ⁼¬tribe of·sons⁺ of·¬Simeon Salamiēl ⁼son Sourisadai

20 and upon of·the ⁼ability ⁼¬tribe of·sons⁺ of·¬Gad Elisaf ⁼the·one of·the Ragouēl

21 and they·will·¬expel the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ Kaath ¬taking·up °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and they·will·stand °the ⁼¬tent ¬until they·should·¬come·themselves

22 and they·will·¬expel °¬order of·¬barracks of·¬Ephraim wiŧh to·ability of·them and upon of·the ⁼ability of·them Elisama ⁼son Emioud

23 and upon of·the ⁼ability ⁼¬tribe of·sons⁺ of·¬Manasseh ¬Gamaliel ⁼the·one of·the Fadassour

26 and upon of·the ⁼ability ⁼¬tribe of·sons⁺ of·¬Asher Fagaiēl ⁼son Echran

27 and upon of·the ⁼ability ⁼¬tribe of·sons⁺ of·¬Naphtali Achire ⁼son Ainan

28 these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬armies⁺ of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·¬expelled wiŧh to·ability of·them

29 and told Mosheh to·the Iōbab ⁼son Ragouēl to·the ⁼¬Midian ⁼the ⁼¬in-law of·Mosheh we·¬expel we to °the ⁼¬place ⁼which told lord °this I·will·give to·you⁺ ¬come with of·us and ¬well °you we·will·do ¬that lord spoke °beautiful⁺ about of·Yisra’el

30 and told unto °him not I·will·¬travel·myself but to °the ⁼earth of·me and to °the ⁼generation of·me

31 and told ńot you·should·¬leave·behind °us of·which ¬because·of you·were with of·us in to·the ⁼¬deserted and you·will·be·yourself in to·us ¬old·man

32 and will·be·himself ifᵮ you·should·be·¬travelled with of·us and will·be·himself °the⁺ ⁼good⁺ ⁼those⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ifᵮ should·do·good lord °us and ¬well °you we·will·do

33 and they·¬expelled out of·the ⁼mountain of·lord °¬road of·three⁺ ⁼days⁺ and the ⁼¬ark of·the ⁼¬covenant of·lord ¬went·before·himself °¬before⁺ of·them °¬road of·three⁺ ⁼days⁺ to·self-¬survey to·them °¬rest

34 and was·generated·himself in to·the·one to·¬expel °the ⁼¬ark and told Mosheh ꜝbe·¬raised lord ꜝlet·them·be·¬scattered⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·you ꜝlet·them·¬flee⁺ all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬hating °you

35 and in to·the ⁼¬rest told ꜝ¬turn lord °thousands⁺ ⁼myriads⁺ in to·the ⁼Yisra’el

36 and the ⁼cloud was·generated·himself ¬shading upon to·them of·day in to·the·one to·¬expel °them out of·the ⁼¬barracks

11 and was the ⁼people ⁼¬murmuring °¬evil⁺ ¬before of·lord and heard lord and was·¬angered to·raging and was·¬been·enflamed in to·them °fire ¬from of·lord and ¬devoured °¬part ⁼whatever of·the ⁼¬barracks

2 and ¬cried the ⁼people unto °Mosheh and ¬prayed·himself Mosheh unto °lord and ¬abated °the ⁼fire

3 and was·called °the ⁼name of·the ⁼¬place ⁼that ¬combustion ¬that was·¬been·enflamed in to·them °fire ¬from of·lord

4 and the ⁼¬intermixed ⁼the·one in to·them they·¬longed·for °¬desire and ¬seating they·¬wept and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·told what °us will·¬feed °meats⁺

5 we·were·¬remembered °the⁺ ⁼fishes⁺ ⁼which⁺ we·¬ate in to·Egypt ¬freely and °the·ones⁺ ¬??? and °the⁺ ⁼¬melons⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬leeks⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬onions⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬garlics⁺

6 now then the ⁼soul of·us ¬dried·up °no·one ¬but to °the ⁼manna the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·us

7 then the ⁼manna ¬like seed of·coriander is and the ⁼¬appearance of·it ¬appearance of·crystal

8 and ¬went·through·himself the ⁼people and they·¬collected and they·¬ground it in to·the ⁼¬millstone and they·¬were·very·busy in to·the ⁼¬hand-mill and they·¬baked °it in to·the ⁼¬earthen·pot and they·did °it °¬cakeses⁺ and was the ⁼¬pleasure of·it ¬like ¬taste ¬pastry out of·¬olive·oil

9 and ¬when ¬came the ⁼¬dew upon °the ⁼¬barracks of·night ¬came the ⁼manna upon of·her

10 and heard Mosheh of·¬weeping of·them ¬according·to °¬peoples⁺ of·them °¬each upon of·the ⁼¬door of·him and was·¬angered to·raging lord ¬very and ¬before of·Mosheh was °¬evil

11 and told Mosheh unto °lord so·that °what you·did·evil °the ⁼¬servant of·you and through °what not I·have·found °¬grace ¬in·front·of of·you to·¬put °the ⁼¬impulse of·the ⁼people ⁼this upon °me*

12 ńot I* in to·¬belly I·took °all ⁼the ⁼people ⁼this or I* I·¬gave·birth·to °them ¬that you·say to·me ꜝtake °him to °the ⁼¬bosom of·you ¬like may·¬take·up ¬wet-nurse °the ⁼suckling to °the ⁼earth ⁼which you·¬swore to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them

13 ¬whence to·me °meats⁺ to·give to·all ⁼the ⁼people ⁼this ¬that they·¬weep upon to·me* saying ꜝgive to·us °meats⁺ so·that we·should·¬eat

14 not I·will·be·able·myself I* ¬alone to·¬bear °the ⁼people ⁼this ¬that °¬weighty to·me is °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this

15 if then thus you you·do to·me ꜝkill·off °me ꜝ¬kill if I·have·found °mercy ¬from to·you so·that ńot I·should·see of·me °the ⁼¬oppression

16 and told lord unto °Mosheh ꜝ¬assemble to·me seventy °men⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼¬elders⁺ of·Yisra’el °which⁺ he you you·have·¬seen ¬that these⁺ they·are ¬elders⁺ of·the ⁼people and writers⁺ of·them and you·will·¬bring °them unto °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and they·will·stand·themselves there with of·you

17 and I·will·¬come·myself and I·will·speak there with of·you and I·will·¬remove off of·the ⁼breath ⁼the·one upon to·you and I·will·¬put upon °them and they·will·¬help·themselves with of·you °the ⁼¬impulse of·the ⁼people and not you·will·¬bear °them you ¬alone

18 and to·the ⁼people you·will·¬say ꜝ¬purify⁺·yourselves⁺ to ¬tomorrow and you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °meats⁺ ¬that you⁺·¬wept ¬before of·lord saying what °us will·¬feed °meats⁺ ¬that beautiful to·us is in to·Egypt and will·give lord to·you⁺ °meats⁺ to·¬eat and you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °meats⁺

19 not °day ⁼one you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ not·then two not·then five °days⁺ not·then ten °days⁺ not·then twenty °days⁺

20 ¬until of·month of·days⁺ you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ ¬until iᵮ should·come·out out of·the⁺ ⁼¬nostrils⁺ of·you⁺ and will·be·himself to·you⁺ to °¬cholera ¬that you⁺·¬disobeyed to·lord which is in to·you⁺ and you⁺·¬wept ¬in·front·of of·him saying so·that what to·us to·come·out out of·Egypt

21 and told Mosheh six·hundred⁺ ⁼thousands⁺ of·¬on·foot⁺ the ⁼people in to·which⁺ I·am in to·them and you you·told °meats⁺ I·will·give to·them to·¬eat and they·will·¬eat·themselves °month of·days⁺

22 ńot sheep⁺ and ¬oxes⁺ they·will·be·¬slaughtered to·them and will·¬be·sufficient to·them or all ⁼the ⁼¬fish of·the ⁼sea will·be·¬assembled to·them and will·¬be·sufficient to·them

23 and told lord unto °Mosheh ńot hand of·lord not will·¬be·enough ¬already you·will·know·yourself if will·¬overtake·himself °you the ⁼saying of·me or not

24 and came·out Mosheh and spoke unto °the ⁼people °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·lord and ¬assembled seventy °men⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼¬elders⁺ of·the ⁼people and stood °them ¬surrounding of·the ⁼¬tent

25 and ¬came lord in to·cloud and spoke unto °him and ¬lifted·from·himself off of·the ⁼breath ⁼the·one upon to·him and ¬put upon °the·ones⁺ seventy °men⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬elders⁺ as then ¬rested·himself °the ⁼breath upon °them and they·¬prophesied and ¬not·any·more they·¬added·themselves

26 and they·were·¬left·behind two men⁺ in to·the ⁼¬barracks °name to·the ⁼one Eldad and °name to·the ⁼second Mōdad and ¬rested·himself upon °them the ⁼breath and these⁺ they·were of·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬broken and not they·came unto °the ⁼¬tent and they·¬prophesied in to·the ⁼¬barracks

27 and ¬hastening ⁼the ⁼youth ¬announced to·Mosheh and told saying Eldad and Mōdad they·¬prophesy in to·the ⁼¬barracks

28 and ¬answered ⁼Yesou ⁼the·one of·the Nauē the ⁼having·¬stood·by to·Mosheh the ⁼¬select told lord of·Mosheh ꜝ¬prevent °them

29 and told to·him Mosheh ńot you·should·be·zealous you to·me and what may·give °all ⁼the ⁼people of·lord °¬prophets⁺ ¬when should·give lord °the ⁼breath of·him upon °them

30 and came·off Mosheh to °the ⁼¬barracks he and the⁺ ⁼¬elders⁺ of·Yisra’el

31 and breath came·out ¬from of·lord and ¬carried·over °¬mother-quail off of·the ⁼sea and ¬put·on upon °the ⁼¬barracks ⁼¬road of·day ¬from·here and °¬road of·day ¬from·here ¬surrounding of·the ⁼¬barracks ¬like of·¬two·cubits off of·the ⁼earth

32 and ¬arising ⁼the ⁼people °¬all ⁼the ⁼day and °¬all ⁼the ⁼night and °¬all ⁼the ⁼day ⁼the·one ¬next·day and they·¬assembled °the ⁼¬mother-quail the·one °the ⁼¬little ¬assembled ten °¬cors⁺ and they·¬cooled to·¬selves⁺ °¬refreshings⁺ ¬surrounding of·the ⁼¬barracks

33 the⁺ ⁼meats⁺ still was in to·the⁺ ⁼teeth⁺ of·them ¬before or to·¬fail and lord was·¬angered to °the ⁼people and ¬struck lord °the ⁼people °¬plague ⁼great ¬very

34 and was·called °the ⁼name of·the ⁼¬place ⁼that °¬tomb of·the ⁼¬desire ¬that there they·¬buried °the ⁼people ⁼the ⁼¬one·who·desires

35 off of·¬tombs⁺ of·¬desire ¬expelled the ⁼people to Asērōth and was·generated·himself the ⁼people in Asērōth

12 and spoke Mariam and Aharon ¬according·to of·Mosheh ¬because·of of·the ⁼woman ⁼the·one °Ethiopian ⁼which took Mosheh ¬that °woman ⁼Ethiopian took

2 and they·told ńot to·Mosheh ⁼¬alone has·spoken lord ¬not! and to·us spoke and heard lord

3 and the ⁼human ⁼Mosheh ⁼¬gentle ¬very ¬from °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼being upon of·the ⁼earth

4 and told lord ¬instantly unto °Mosheh and °Mariam and °Aharon ꜝcome·out⁺ you⁺ the⁺ ⁼three⁺ to °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and they·came·out the⁺ ⁼three⁺ to °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

5 and ¬came lord in to·pillar of·cloud and stood upon of·the ⁼¬door ⁼the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and they·were·called °Aharon and °Mariam and they·came·out ¬both⁺

6 and told unto °them ꜝhear⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ of·me ifᵮ should·be·generated·himself ¬prophet of·you⁺ to·lord in to·sight to·him I·will·be·known and in to·¬sleep I·will·speak to·him

7 not thus the ⁼¬servant of·me Mosheh in to·¬all ⁼the ⁼house of·me ¬faithful is

8 °mouth ¬according·to °mouth I·will·speak to·him in to·¬appearance and not through of·¬enigmas⁺ and °the ⁼glory of·lord saw and through °what not you⁺·were·afraid to·¬slander ¬according·to of·the ⁼¬servant of·me of·Mosheh

9 and raging of·¬wrath ⁼lord upon to·them and came·off

10 and the ⁼cloud ¬left off of·the ⁼¬tent and ¬¡see! Mariam ⁼¬becoming·leprous ¬like ¬snow and ¬looked·upon Aharon upon °Mariam and ¬¡see! ¬becoming·leprous

11 and told Aharon unto °Mosheh I·¬pray·myself lord ńot you·should·¬join·in·making·an·attack·yourself to·us °sin ¬because we·¬were·ignorant ¬as we·sinned

12 ńot should·be·generated·himself ¬like °¬equal to·death ¬like ¬untimely·birth ⁼self-¬departing out of·motherhood ⁼mother and ¬devours °the ⁼¬half of·the⁺ ⁼fleshes⁺ of·her

13 and ¬cried·out Mosheh unto °lord saying ⁼the ⁼God I·¬pray·myself of·you ꜝ¬heal·yourself °her

14 and told lord unto °Mosheh if the ⁼father of·her ¬spitting ¬spit·on to °the ⁼face of·her not will·be·¬caused·shame seven °days⁺ ꜝlet·be·¬separated seven °days⁺ out of·the ⁼¬barracks and with °these⁺ will·come·to·himself

15 and was·¬separated Mariam out of·the ⁼¬barracks seven °days⁺ and the ⁼people not ¬expelled ¬until was·¬cleaned Mariam

16 and with °these⁺ ¬expelled the ⁼people out Asērōth and they·¬inserted·against in to·the ⁼¬deserted of·the Faran

13 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

2 ꜝmission·off to·yourself °men⁺ and ꜝlet·them·¬survey⁺·themselves °the ⁼earth of·the⁺ ⁼¬Canaanites⁺ °which I* I·give to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to °¬possession °man ⁼one ¬according·to °¬tribe ¬according·to °¬peoples⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·them you·will·mission·off °them °all ⁼¬founder out of·them

3 and ¬sended·out °them Mosheh out of·the ⁼¬deserted Faran through of·voice of·lord all⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼¬founders⁺ of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el these⁺

4 and these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·them of·the ⁼¬tribe of·¬Reuben Salamiēl ⁼son Zakchour

5 of·the ⁼¬tribe of·¬Simeon Safat ⁼son Souri

6 of·the ⁼¬tribe of·Yudah Chaleb ⁼son Iefonnē

12 of·the ⁼¬tribe Dan Amiēl ⁼son Gamali

13 of·the ⁼¬tribe of·¬Asher Sathour ⁼son of·¬Michael

14 of·the ⁼¬tribe of·¬Naphtali Nabi ⁼son ¬???

15 of·the ⁼¬tribe of·¬Gad Goudiēl ⁼son Makchi

16 these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼names⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼men⁺ °which⁺ missioned·off Mosheh to·self-¬survey °the ⁼earth and ¬named Mosheh °the ⁼Yesou ⁼son Nauē °Yesou

17 and missioned·off °them Mosheh to·self-¬survey °the ⁼earth of·¬Canaan and told unto °them ꜝ¬ascend⁺ to·this ⁼the ⁼¬deserted and you⁺·will·¬ascend·yourselves⁺ to °the ⁼mountain

18 and you⁺·will·see·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼earth what is and °the ⁼people ⁼the ⁼self-¬lying·in·wait upon of·her if ¬strong is or ¬weak if ¬little⁺ they·are or many⁺

19 and what ⁼the ⁼earth to °which these⁺ they·¬lie·in·wait·themselves upon of·her if beautiful is or °¬evil⁺ and what⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ to °which⁺ these⁺ they·¬dwell in to·them if in to·walled⁺ or in to·¬unwalled⁺

20 and what ⁼the ⁼earth if ¬plenty or having·self-¬neglected if is in to·her °trees⁺ or not and ¬continuing·in you⁺·will·take·yourselves⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼fruits⁺ of·the ⁼earth and the⁺ ⁼days⁺ ⁼days⁺ of·¬spring·season ¬forerunners⁺ of·¬grape

21 and ¬ascending they·¬surveyed·themselves °the ⁼earth off of·the ⁼¬deserted Sin ¬until of·¬Rahab of·self-¬entering Efaath

22 and they·¬ascended ¬according·to °the ⁼¬deserted and they·came ¬until Chebrōn and there Achiman and Sessi and Thelamin generations⁺ Enach and Chebrōn seven to·years⁺ was·¬built ¬before of·the Tanin of·Egypt

23 and they·came ¬until of·¬valley of·¬bunch·of·grapes and they·¬surveyed·themselves °her and they·chopped ¬from·there °¬branch and °¬bunch·of·grapes of·¬grape °one upon of·him and they·¬took·up °him upon to·¬bearing·poles⁺ and off of·the⁺ ⁼¬pomegranates⁺ and off of·the⁺ ⁼¬fig·trees⁺

24 °the ⁼¬place ⁼that they·¬named ¬valley of·¬bunch·of·grapes through °the ⁼¬bunch·of·grapes ⁼which they·chopped ¬from·there the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

25 and they·¬turned·away ¬from·there self-¬surveying °the ⁼earth with forty °days⁺

26 and ¬travelled they·came unto °Mosheh and °Aharon and unto °all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to °the ⁼¬deserted Faran Kadēs and they·were·¬answered to·them °¬declaration and to·all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue and they·¬showed °the ⁼fruit of·the ⁼earth

27 and they·¬related·fully·themselves to·him and they·told we·came to °the ⁼earth to °which you·missioned·off °us °earth ⁼¬flowing °milk and °honey and this ⁼the ⁼fruit of·her

28 but or ¬that ¬bold ⁼the ⁼nation ⁼the ⁼¬dwelling upon of·her and the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼¬fortified⁺ ⁼having·self-walled and great⁺ ¬very and °the ⁼generation Enach we·have·seen there

29 and Amalēk ¬dwells in to·the ⁼earth ⁼the·one unto °south and the Chettaios and the Euaios and the Iebousaios and the Amorraios ¬dwells in to·the ⁼¬hilly and the ⁼¬Canaanite ¬dwells ¬from °sea and ¬from °the ⁼¬Jordan ⁼¬river

30 and ¬observed·silence Chaleb °the ⁼people unto °Mosheh and told to·him ¬not! but ¬ascending we·will·¬ascend·ourselves and we·will·¬allot °her ¬that able⁺ we·will·be·able·ourselves unto °them

31 and the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬ascending·with with of·him they·told not we·¬ascend ¬that not ńot we·should·be·able·ourselves to·¬ascend unto °the ⁼nation ¬that °¬strong is of·us ¬more

32 and they·¬brought °¬amazement of·the ⁼earth °which they·¬surveyed·themselves °her unto °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el saying °the ⁼earth ⁼which we·¬passed·by °her to·self-¬survey earth ⁼¬devouring °the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling upon of·her is all ⁼the ⁼people °which we·have·seen in to·her men⁺ ⁼¬exceedingly·talls⁺

33 and there we·have·seen °the⁺ ⁼¬giants⁺ and we·were ¬before of·them ¬like ¬locusts⁺ but and thus we·were ¬before of·them

14 and ¬taking·up ⁼all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue gave °voice and ¬wept the ⁼people °¬all ⁼the ⁼night ⁼that

2 and they·¬murmured upon °Mosheh and °Aharon all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·told unto °them all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue I·wished we·died·off in to·earth ⁼Egypt or in to·the ⁼¬deserted ⁼this if we·died·off

3 and so·that °what lord ¬brings·in °us to °the ⁼earth ⁼this to·¬collapse in to·war the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·us and the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ they·will·be·themselves to °¬ravaging now therefore °¬better to·us is to·be·¬turned·away to °Egypt

4 and they·told óther to·the ⁼óther we·should·give °¬founder and we·should·¬turn·away to °Egypt

5 and ¬collapsed Mosheh and Aharon upon °face ¬in·front·of of·all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

6 Yesou then the·one of·the Nauē and Chaleb ⁼the·one of·the Iefonnē of·the⁺ ⁼self-¬surveying °the ⁼earth they·¬tore °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·them

7 and they·told unto °all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el saying the ⁼earth °which we·¬surveyed·ourselves °her good is ¬very ¬very

8 if ¬chooses °us lord will·¬bring·in °us to °the ⁼earth ⁼this and will·give °her to·us earth ⁼who is ¬flowing °milk and °honey

9 but off of·the ⁼lord ńot ¬defectors⁺ ꜝbe·generated⁺·yourselves⁺ you⁺ then ńot ꜝbe·afraid⁺ °the ⁼people of·the ⁼earth ¬that °¬thing·devoured to·us is has·¬left for the ⁼¬time off of·them then the ⁼lord in to·us ńot you⁺·should·be·afraid °them

10 and told all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue to·¬cast·a·stone·at °them in to·stones⁺ and the ⁼glory of·lord was·seen in to·cloud upon of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

11 and told lord unto °Mosheh ¬until of·what ¬provokes °me the ⁼people ⁼this and ¬until of·what not they·trust to·me in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼signs⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·did in to·them

12 I·will·¬strike °them to·death and I·will·¬destroy °them and I·should·do °you and °the ⁼house of·the ⁼father of·you to °nation ⁼great and °much ¬more or °this

13 and told Mosheh unto °lord and will·hear·himself Egypt ¬that you·¬led to·the ⁼¬strength of·you °the ⁼people ⁼this out of·them

14 but and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling upon of·the ⁼earth ⁼this they·have·heard ¬that you you·are lord in to·the ⁼people ⁼this who to·eyes⁺ ¬according·to °eyes⁺ you·are·¬beheld lord and the ⁼cloud of·you has·¬approached upon of·them and in to·pillar of·cloud you you·¬travel·yourself ¬before of·them °the ⁼day and in to·pillar of·fire °the ⁼night

15 and you·will·¬obliterate °the ⁼people ⁼this ¬like °human ⁼one and they·will·¬say the⁺ ⁼nations⁺ whatever⁺ they·have·heard °the ⁼name of·you saying

16 ¬from °the·one ńot to·self-be·able °lord to·¬bring·in °the ⁼people ⁼this to °the ⁼earth ⁼which ¬swore to·them ¬was·thrown·down °them in to·the ⁼¬deserted

17 and now ꜝlet·be·¬lifted·up the ⁼¬strength of·you lord °which ⁼¬way you·told saying

18 ⁼lord ⁼¬lenient and ¬full·of·mercy and ¬true ⁼¬removing of·¬lawlessness and of·¬unrighteousness and of·sin and to·¬cleansing not will·¬clean °the ⁼¬liable·for ¬paying of·sin of·fathers⁺ upon °¬children⁺ ¬until of·third and of·fourth

19 ꜝ¬release °the ⁼sin to·the ⁼people ⁼this ¬according·to °the ⁼great ⁼mercy of·you ¬just·as ¬propitious to·them you·were·generated·yourself off of·Egypt ¬until of·the·one now

20 and told lord unto °Mosheh ¬propitious to·them I·am ¬according·to °the ⁼¬declaration of·you

21 but I·live I* and living ⁼the ⁼name of·me and will·¬fill·up the ⁼glory of·lord °all ⁼the ⁼earth

22 ¬that all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼seeing °the ⁼glory of·me and °the⁺ ⁼signs⁺ ⁼which⁺ I·did in to·Egypt and in to·the ⁼¬deserted ⁼this and they·¬tested °me °this ⁼tenth and not they·¬listened·to of·me of·the ⁼voice

23 or ¬certainly not they·will·see·themselves °the ⁼earth ⁼which I·¬swore to·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·them but or °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·them °which⁺ is with myˊ ¬here whatever⁺ not they·have·¬seen °good not·then °evil all ⁼young ⁼¬unacquainted to·these⁺ I·will·give °the ⁼earth all⁺ then the⁺ ⁼¬provoking °me not they·will·see·themselves °her

24 then the ⁼¬child of·me Chaleb ¬that was·been·generated °breath ⁼óther in to·him and ¬followed·after to·me I·will·¬bring·in °him to °the ⁼earth to °which came·to there and °the ⁼seed of·him will·¬inherit °her

25 then the Amalēk and the ⁼¬Canaanite they·¬dwell in to·the ⁼¬cavity ¬tomorrow you⁺·should·be·¬turned you⁺ and ꜝ¬take·away⁺ to °the ⁼¬deserted ⁼¬road ⁼sea ⁼¬Red·Sea

26 and told lord unto °Mosheh and °Aharon saying

27 ¬until of·what °the ⁼¬synagogue ⁼the ⁼¬evil ⁼this °which⁺ they they·¬murmur ¬in·front·of myˊ °the ⁼¬grumbling of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °which they·¬murmured about of·you⁺ I·have·heard

28 ꜝtell to·them I·live I* says lord or ¬certainly °which ⁼¬way you⁺·have·spoken to °the⁺ ⁼ears⁺ of·me thus I·should·do to·you⁺

29 in to·the ⁼¬deserted ⁼this will·¬collapse·himself °the⁺ ⁼¬corpses⁺ of·you⁺ and all ⁼the ⁼¬oversight of·you⁺ and the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬numbered of·you⁺ off of·twenty·years and ¬above whatever⁺ they·¬murmured upon to·me*

30 if you⁺ you⁺·will·come·to·yourselves⁺ to °the ⁼earth upon °which I·¬stretched·out °the ⁼hand of·me to·¬dwell °you⁺ upon of·her but or Chaleb ⁼son Iefonnē and Yesou ⁼the·one of·the Nauē

31 and °the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ ⁼which⁺ you⁺·told in to·¬ravaging to·be·going·to·self-be I·will·¬bring·in °them to °the ⁼earth and they·will·¬inherit °the ⁼earth ⁼which you⁺ you⁺·¬left off of·her

32 and °the⁺ ⁼¬corpses⁺ of·you⁺ will·¬collapse·himself in to·the ⁼¬deserted ⁼this

33 then the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you⁺ they·will·be·themselves self-¬feeding in to·the ⁼¬deserted forty °years⁺ and they·will·¬carry·up °the ⁼fornication of·you⁺ ¬until iᵮ should·be·¬consumed °the⁺ ⁼¬corpses⁺ of·you⁺ in to·the ⁼¬deserted

34 ¬according·to °the ⁼¬number of·the⁺ ⁼days⁺ °whatever⁺ you⁺·¬surveyed·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼earth forty °days⁺ °day of·the ⁼¬year you⁺·will·take·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·you⁺ forty °years⁺ and you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼¬wrath of·the ⁼raging of·me

35 I* lord I·spoke or ¬certainly thus I·should·do to·the ⁼¬synagogue ⁼the ⁼¬evil ⁼this ⁼the ⁼having·self-¬rised·up·together·against upon °me* in to·the ⁼¬deserted ⁼this they·will·be·¬consumed and there they·will·die·off·themselves

36 and the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ °which⁺ missioned·off Mosheh to·self-¬survey °the ⁼earth and ¬come they·¬murmured ¬according·to of·her unto °the ⁼¬synagogue to·¬bring °¬declarations⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺ about of·the ⁼earth

37 and they·died·off the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬denouncing ¬according·to of·the ⁼earth °¬evil⁺ in to·the ⁼¬plague ¬before of·lord

38 and Yesou ⁼son Nauē and Chaleb ⁼son Iefonnē they·lived off of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼those⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬travelled to·self-¬survey °the ⁼earth

39 and spoke Mosheh °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ ⁼these⁺ unto °all⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and ¬mourned the ⁼people ¬very

40 and ¬rising·at·dawn °the·one ¬early they·¬ascended to °the ⁼¬head of·the ⁼mountain saying ¬¡see! ¬these⁺ we we·will·¬ascend·ourselves to °the ⁼¬place ⁼which told lord ¬that we·sinned

41 and told Mosheh so·that °what you⁺ you⁺·¬transgress °the ⁼¬declaration of·lord not ¬prosperous⁺ will·be·himself to·you⁺

42 ńot you⁺·¬ascend not for is lord with of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·¬collapse·yourselves⁺ ¬before of·face of·the⁺ ⁼¬enemies⁺ of·you⁺

43 ¬that the Amalēk and the ⁼¬Canaanite there ¬before of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·¬collapse·yourselves⁺ to·¬sword of·which ¬because·of you⁺·were·¬turned·away ¬disobeying to·lord and not will·be·himself lord in to·you⁺

44 and self-¬forcing·through they·¬ascended upon °the ⁼¬head of·the ⁼mountain then the ⁼¬ark of·the ⁼¬covenant of·lord and Mosheh not they·were·¬moved out of·the ⁼¬barracks

45 and ¬came the Amalēk and the ⁼¬Canaanite ⁼the ⁼self-¬lying·in·wait in to·the ⁼mountain ⁼that and they·¬routed·themselves °them and they·¬cut °them ¬until Erman and they·were·¬turned·away to °the ⁼¬barracks

15 and told lord unto °Mosheh saying

2 ꜝspeak to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and you·will·¬say unto °them ¬when you⁺·should·come·to to °the ⁼earth of·the ⁼¬dwelling of·you⁺ °which I* I·give to·you⁺

3 and you·will·do °¬burnt·offerings⁺ to·lord °¬whole·offering or °¬sacrifice to·¬magnify °¬vow or ¬according·to °¬voluntary or in to·the⁺ ⁼¬festivals⁺ of·you⁺ to·do °¬aroma of·¬aroma to·lord if ¬on·the·other·hand off of·the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ or off of·the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺

4 and will·¬bring·to the ⁼¬bringing·to °the ⁼¬gift of·him to·lord °¬sacrifice of·¬fine·flour °tenth of·the ⁼¬ephah of·having·been·¬prepared in to·¬olive·oil in to·fourth of·the ⁼¬hin

5 and °wine to °¬libation °the ⁼fourth of·the ⁼¬hin you⁺·will·do upon of·the ⁼¬bringing·of·a·whole·burnt-offering or upon of·the ⁼¬sacrifice to·the ⁼¬lamb ⁼the ⁼one you·will·do °¬so·great ⁼¬yield °¬aroma of·¬aroma to·the ⁼lord

6 and to·the ⁼¬ram ¬when you⁺·should·do °him or to °¬burnt·offering or to °¬sacrifice you·will·do °¬sacrifice of·¬fine·flour two °tenth⁺ of·having·been·¬prepared in to·¬olive·oil °the ⁼third of·the ⁼¬hin

7 and °wine to °¬libation °the ⁼third of·the ⁼¬hin you⁺·will·¬bring·to to °¬aroma of·¬aroma to·lord

8 ifᵮ then off of·the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ you⁺·should·do to °¬burnt·offering or to °¬sacrifice to·¬magnify °¬vow or to °¬saving to·lord

9 and will·¬bring·to upon of·the ⁼calf °¬sacrifice of·¬fine·flour °three⁺ ⁼tenth⁺ of·having·been·¬prepared in to·¬olive·oil °¬half of·the ⁼¬hin

10 and °wine to °¬libation °the ⁼¬half of·the ⁼¬hin °¬yield °¬aroma of·¬aroma to·lord

11 thus you·will·do to·the ⁼calf ⁼the ⁼one or to·the ⁼¬ram ⁼the ⁼one or to·the ⁼¬lamb ⁼the ⁼one out of·the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ or out of·the⁺ ⁼¬goats⁺

12 ¬according·to °the ⁼¬number of·which⁺ ifᵮ you⁺·should·do thus you⁺·will·do to·the ⁼one ¬according·to °the ⁼¬number of·them

13 all ⁼the ⁼¬native-born will·do thus °¬such·as·this⁺ to·¬bring·to °¬yields⁺ to °¬aroma of·¬aroma to·lord

14 ifᵮ then ¬proselyte in to·you⁺ should·¬unite·with·himself in to·the ⁼earth of·you⁺ or which iᵮ should·be·generated·himself in to·you⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·you⁺ and will·do °¬yield °¬aroma of·¬aroma to·lord °which ⁼¬way you⁺·do you⁺ thus will·do the ⁼¬synagogue to·lord

15 law ⁼one will·be·himself to·you⁺ and to·the⁺ ⁼¬proselytes⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-¬joining·up·with in to·you⁺ law ⁼eternal to °generations⁺ of·you⁺ as you⁺ and the ⁼¬proselyte will·be·himself ¬before of·lord

16 law ⁼one will·be·himself and °just·deed ⁼one will·be·himself to·you⁺ and to·the ⁼¬proselyte ⁼the ⁼self-¬joining·up·with in to·you⁺

17 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

18 ꜝspeak to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and you·will·¬say unto °them in to·the·one to·self-¬enter °you⁺ to °the ⁼earth to °which I* I·¬bring·in °you⁺ there

19 and will·be·himself ¬when you⁺·should·¬eat you⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼breads⁺ of·the ⁼earth you⁺·will·¬remove °¬choice·portion ⁼¬separation to·lord

20 °¬firstfruits of·¬lump of·you⁺ °bread °¬choice·portion you⁺·will·¬separate °it as °¬choice·portion off of·¬threshing-floor thus you⁺·will·¬remove °him

21 °¬firstfruits of·¬lump of·you⁺ and you⁺·will·give to·lord °¬choice·portion to °the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·you⁺

22 ¬when then you⁺·should·¬testify·solemnly and ńot you⁺·should·do °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬commandments⁺ ⁼these⁺ ⁼which⁺ spoke lord unto °Mosheh

23 ¬as ¬directed lord unto °you⁺ in to·hand of·Mosheh off of·the ⁼day ⁼which ¬directed lord unto °you⁺ and ¬beyond to °the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·you⁺

24 and will·be·himself ifᵮ out of·eyes⁺ of·the ⁼¬synagogue should·be·been·generated ¬unintentionally and will·do all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue °calf ⁼one out of·¬oxes⁺ °¬blameless to °¬burnt·offering to °¬aroma of·¬aroma to·lord and °¬sacrifice of·this and °¬libation of·him ¬according·to °the ⁼¬rate and °¬1·winter·yearling out of·¬goats⁺ °one about of·sin

25 and will·¬appease·himself the ⁼priest about of·all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and will·be·¬released to·them ¬that °¬unintentional is and they they·¬bore °the ⁼¬gift of·them °¬yield to·lord about of·the ⁼sin of·them ¬before of·lord about of·the⁺ ⁼¬unintentional⁺ of·them

26 and will·be·¬released ¬according·to °all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and to·the ⁼¬proselyte ⁼the ⁼self-¬joining·up·with unto °you⁺ ¬that to·all ⁼the ⁼people °¬unintentional

27 ifᵮ then soul ⁼one should·sin ¬unintentionally will·¬bring·near °¬goat °one ⁼¬of·a·year about of·sin

28 and will·¬appease·himself the ⁼priest about of·the ⁼soul ⁼the ⁼¬acted·unintentionally and of·sinning ¬unintentionally ¬before of·lord to·self-¬appease about of·him

29 to·the ⁼¬native·inhabitant in to·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and to·the ⁼¬proselyte ⁼the ⁼self-¬joining·up·with in to·them law ⁼one will·be·himself to·them which iᵮ should·do ¬unintentionally

30 and soul ⁼who will·do in to·hand of·¬pride off of·the·ones⁺ of·¬native-borns⁺ or off of·the⁺ ⁼¬proselytes⁺ °the ⁼God this ¬provokes will·be·¬rooted·out the ⁼soul ⁼that out of·the ⁼people of·her

31 ¬that °the ⁼¬declaration of·lord ¬treated·as·worthless and °the⁺ ⁼¬commandments⁺ of·him ¬dispersed will·¬obliteration will·be·¬obliterated the ⁼soul ⁼that ⁼the ⁼sin of·her in to·her

32 and they·were the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el in to·the ⁼¬deserted and they·found °man ⁼¬collecting °¬woods⁺ to·the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺

33 and they·¬brought·near °him the⁺ ⁼finding °him ⁼¬collecting °¬woods⁺ to·the ⁼day of·the⁺ ⁼shabbats⁺ unto °Mosheh and °Aharon and unto °all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

34 and they·¬put·aside·themselves °him to °¬prison not for they·¬compared °what they·should·do °him

35 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying to·death ꜝlet·put·to·death·himself the ⁼human ꜝ¬stone⁺ °him to·stones⁺ all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue

36 and they·¬led·out °him all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue out of·the ⁼¬barracks and they·¬stoned °him all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue to·stones⁺ out of·the ⁼¬barracks ¬as ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

37 and told lord unto °Mosheh saying

38 ꜝspeak to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and you·will·¬say unto °them and ꜝlet·them·do⁺ to·¬selves⁺ °¬edges⁺ upon °the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·them to °the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·them and you⁺·will·¬put upon °the⁺ ⁼¬edges⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼wings⁺ °¬yarn ⁼hyacinth

39 and will·be·himself to·you⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼¬edges⁺ and you⁺·will·see·yourselves⁺ °them and you⁺·will·be·¬remembered of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬commandments⁺ of·lord and you⁺·will·do °them and not you⁺·will·be·¬perverted ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼¬minds⁺ of·you⁺ and ¬after of·the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·you⁺ in to·which⁺ you⁺ you⁺·fornicate·out ¬after of·them

40 ¬that iᵮ you⁺·should·be·¬remembered and you⁺·should·do °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬commandments⁺ of·me and you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ holy⁺ to·the ⁼God of·you⁺

41 I* lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you⁺ the ⁼¬leading·out °you⁺ out of·earth ⁼Egypt to·be of·you⁺ God I* lord ⁼the ⁼God of·you⁺

16 and spoke ¬Korah ⁼son Issaar ⁼son Kaath ⁼son ⁼¬Levi and Dathan and Abirōn sons⁺ Eliab and Aun ⁼son of·¬Peleg ⁼son ⁼¬Reuben

2 and they·¬arose ¬before of·Mosheh and men⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el fifty and two·hundred⁺ ⁼¬founders⁺ of·¬synagogue ¬summoned⁺ of·¬plan and men⁺ ⁼¬famous⁺

3 they·¬commended upon °Mosheh and °Aharon and they·told ꜝlet·have to·you⁺ ¬that all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue all⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and in to·them lord and through °what you⁺·¬stand·against·yourselves⁺ upon °the ⁼¬synagogue of·lord

4 and hearing ⁼Mosheh ¬collapsed upon °face

5 and spoke unto °¬Korah and unto °all of·him °the ⁼¬synagogue saying has·¬visited·himself and knew the ⁼God °the⁺ ⁼being of·him and °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and ¬brought·near·himself unto °himself and °which⁺ ¬selected·himself to·himself ¬brought·near·himself unto °himself

6 °this ꜝdo⁺ ꜝtake⁺ to·you⁺ to·them ¬censers⁺ ¬Korah and all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue of·him

7 and ꜝ¬put⁺ upon °them °fire and ꜝ¬put⁺ upon °them °¬incense ¬before of·lord ¬tomorrow and will·be·himself the ⁼man °which iᵮ should·¬select·himself lord ⁼this ⁼holy ꜝlet·¬qualify·himself to·you⁺ sons⁺ of·¬Levi

8 and told Mosheh unto °¬Korah ꜝ¬listen·to⁺ of·me sons⁺ of·¬Levi

9 ńot ¬small is this to·you⁺ ¬that ¬gave·orders the ⁼God of·Yisra’el °you⁺ out of·¬synagogue of·Yisra’el and ¬brought·near·himself °you⁺ unto °himself to·¬minister °the⁺ ⁼¬ministries⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·lord and to·self-¬stand·by ¬before of·the ⁼¬synagogue to·¬minister to·them

10 and ¬brought·near·himself °you and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you °sons⁺ of·¬Levi with of·you and you⁺·¬seek to·be·priest

11 thus you and all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue of·you the ⁼having·self-¬assembled unto °the ⁼God and Aharon ⁼what is ¬that you⁺·¬murmur ¬according·to of·him

12 and missioned·off Mosheh to·call Dathan and Abirōn °sons⁺ Eliab and they·told not we·¬ascend

13 ńot ¬small ⁼this ¬that you·¬led °us out of·earth ⁼¬flowing °milk and °honey to·kill·off °us in to·the ⁼¬deserted ¬that you·¬rule of·us ¬ruler

14 if and to °earth ⁼¬flowing °milk and °honey you·¬brought·in °us and you·gave to·us °¬lot of·field and °vineyards⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼eyes⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼those⁺ iᵮ you·¬prevented not we·¬ascend

15 and ¬was·weighed·down Mosheh ¬very and told unto °lord ńot you·should·¬watch·out to °the ⁼¬sacrifice of·them not °¬desire of·no·one of·them I·have·taken not·then I·did·evil °no·one of·them

16 and told Mosheh unto °¬Korah ꜝmake·holy °the ⁼¬synagogue of·you and ꜝbe·generated⁺·yourselves⁺ ¬ready⁺ ¬before of·lord you and they and Aharon ¬tomorrow

17 and ꜝtake⁺ ¬each °the ⁼¬censer of·him and you⁺·will·¬put upon °them °¬incense and you⁺·will·¬bring·near ¬before of·lord ¬each °the ⁼¬censer of·him fifty and °two·hundred⁺ ⁼¬censers⁺ and you and Aharon ⁼¬each °the ⁼¬censer of·him

18 and took ¬each °the ⁼¬censer of·him and they·¬put upon °them °fire and they·¬put·on upon °it ⁼¬incense and they·stood ¬from °the⁺ ⁼¬doors⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness Mosheh and Aharon

19 and ¬rised·up·together·against upon °them ¬Korah °the ⁼all of·him °¬synagogue ¬from °the ⁼¬door of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and was·seen the ⁼glory of·lord to·all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue

20 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh and °Aharon saying

21 ꜝbe·¬severed⁺ out of·middle of·the ⁼¬synagogue ⁼this and I·will·¬consume °them to ¬once

22 and they·¬collapsed upon °face of·them and they·told God ⁼God of·the⁺ ⁼breaths⁺ and of·all ⁼flesh if human ⁼one sinned upon °all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue raging of·lord

23 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

25 and ¬arose Mosheh and was·¬travelled unto Dathan and Abirōn and they·were·¬gone·with with of·him all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬elders⁺ of·Yisra’el

26 and spoke unto °the ⁼¬synagogue saying ꜝbe·¬severed⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼¬tents⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬hard⁺ ⁼these⁺ and ńot you⁺·touch·yourselves⁺ off of·all⁺ ⁼which⁺ is to·them ńot you⁺·should·¬die·yourselves⁺ in to·all ⁼the ⁼sin of·them

27 and they·¬left off of·the ⁼¬tent ¬Korah ¬surrounding and Dathan and Abirōn they·came·out and they·had·stood ¬from °the⁺ ⁼¬doors⁺ of·the·ones⁺ of·¬tents⁺ of·them and the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·them and °the·ones⁺ ¬children⁺ of·them and the ⁼¬accoutrements of·them

28 and told Mosheh in to·this you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺ ¬that lord missioned·off °me to·do °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼works⁺ ⁼these⁺ ¬that not off of·myself

29 if ¬according·to °death of·all⁺ ⁼humans⁺ they·will·die·off·themselves these⁺ if and ¬according·to °¬review of·all⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ¬oversight will·be·himself of·them ¬not! lord has·missioned·off °me

30 but or in to·¬visible·manifestation will·¬show lord and ¬opening ⁼the ⁼earth °the ⁼mouth of·her will·¬swallow·himself °them and °the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬tents⁺ of·them and °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ is to·them and they·will·¬come·themselves living to of·¬hell and you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺ ¬that they·¬provoked the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼these⁺ °the ⁼lord

31 as then ¬ceased·himself speaking °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sayings⁺ ⁼these⁺ was·¬thrown·violently the ⁼earth ¬under of·them

32 and was·¬opened the ⁼earth and ¬swallowed °them and °the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·them and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼being with of·¬Korah and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·them

17 and told lord unto °Mosheh

2 and unto °¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼son of·Aharon °the ⁼priest ꜝ¬kill⁺·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬censers⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼copper⁺ out of·middle of·the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬burned and °the ⁼fire ⁼the ⁼¬another's ⁼this ꜝseed there ¬that they·made·holy

3 °the⁺ ⁼¬censers⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬sinful⁺ ⁼these⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ of·them and ꜝdo °them °¬scales⁺ ⁼¬hammered·outs⁺ °¬adornment to·the ⁼¬altar ¬that they·were·¬brought·to ¬before of·lord and they·were·made·holy and they·were·generated·themselves to °sign to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

4 and took ¬Eleazar ⁼son of·Aharon ⁼the ⁼priest °the⁺ ⁼¬censers⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼copper⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ they·¬brought·to the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬burned and they·¬added °them °¬adornment to·the ⁼¬altar

5 °¬memorial to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬that iᵮ ńot should·come·unto ¬nothing ⁼¬foreign ⁼which not is out of·the ⁼seed of·Aharon to·¬put °¬incense ¬before of·lord and not will·be·himself ¬just·as ¬Korah and the ⁼¬insurrection of·him ¬as spoke lord in to·hand of·Mosheh

6 and they·¬murmured the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·the·one ¬next·day upon °Mosheh and °Aharon saying you⁺ you⁺·have·killed·off °the ⁼people of·lord

7 and was·generated·himself in to·the·one to·self-¬gather·together·against °the ⁼¬synagogue upon °Mosheh and °Aharon and they·¬stampeded upon °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and °¬this ¬covered °her the ⁼cloud and was·seen the ⁼glory of·lord

12 and took Aharon ¬just·as spoke to·him Mosheh and ¬ran to °the ⁼¬synagogue and ¬already had·¬begined·himself the ⁼¬devastation in to·the ⁼people and ¬put·on °the ⁼¬incense and ¬appeased·himself about of·the ⁼people

13 and stood ¬each °middle of·the⁺ ⁼having·died and of·the⁺ ⁼living and ¬abated the ⁼¬devastation

15 and ¬turned Aharon unto °Mosheh upon °the ⁼¬door of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and ¬abated the ⁼¬devastation

16 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

20 and will·be·himself the ⁼human °which ifᵮ I·should·¬select·myself °him the ⁼¬rod of·him will·¬sprout·forth and I·will·¬take·away off myˊ °the ⁼¬murmuring of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °which⁺ they they·¬murmur upon to·you⁺

21 and spoke Mosheh to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·gave to·him all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·them °¬rod to·the ⁼¬ruler ⁼the ⁼one °¬rod ¬according·to °¬ruler ¬according·to °houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·them twelve °¬rods⁺ and the ⁼¬rod of·Aharon ¬each °middle of·the⁺ ⁼¬rods⁺ of·them
