26 and did Mosheh and Aharon ¬as ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh thus they·did

27 and they·told the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el unto °Mosheh saying ¬¡see! we·have·been·¬consumed we·have·¬destroyed we·have·been·¬uselesslied·consume

28 all ⁼the ⁼self-touching of·the ⁼¬tent of·lord dies·off ¬until to °¬goal we·should·die·off

18 and told lord unto °Aharon saying you and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you and the ⁼house of·paternity of·you you⁺·will·take·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and you and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you you⁺·will·take·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ of·the ⁼priesthood of·you⁺

2 and °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you °¬tribe of·¬Levi °¬people of·the ⁼father of·you ꜝ¬bring·near·yourself unto °yourself and ꜝlet·them·be·¬added⁺ to·you and ꜝlet·them·¬minister⁺ to·you and you and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you with of·you ¬opposite of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

3 and they·will·¬keep·themselves °the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ of·you and °the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent ¬but unto °the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and unto °the ⁼¬altar not they·will·come·unto·themselves and not they·will·die·off·themselves and these⁺ and you⁺

4 and they·will·be·¬added unto °you and they·will·¬keep·themselves °the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·¬ministry ⁼the ⁼¬tent and the ⁼¬foreign not will·come·unto·himself unto °you

5 and you⁺·will·¬keep·yourselves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ of·the ⁼¬altar and not will·be·himself ¬wrath in to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

6 and I* I·have·taken °the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ out of·middle of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °¬gift ⁼having·self-given to·lord to·¬minister °the⁺ ⁼¬ministries⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

7 and you and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you with of·you you⁺·will·¬keep °the ⁼priesthood of·you⁺ ¬according·to °all ⁼¬way of·the ⁼¬altar and °the·one ¬within of·the ⁼¬curtain and you⁺·will·¬minister °the⁺ ⁼¬ministries⁺ °¬gift of·the ⁼priesthood of·you⁺ and the ⁼¬foreign ⁼the ⁼self-¬approaching will·die·off·himself

8 and spoke lord unto °Aharon and I* ¬¡see! I·have·given to·you⁺ °the ⁼¬preservation of·the⁺ ⁼¬firstfruitses⁺ off of·all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ of·having·been·made·holy to·me ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·you I·have·given °them to °¬honor and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you with °you °law ⁼eternal

9 and °this ꜝlet·be to·you⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼having·been·made·holy ⁼holy⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬yields⁺ off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬gifts⁺ of·them and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·them and off of·all ⁼¬trespass of·them and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼sins⁺ °whatever⁺ they·¬pay to·me off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ to·you will·be·himself and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you

10 in to·the ⁼holy of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °them all ⁼¬male will·¬eat·himself °them you and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you holy⁺ will·be·himself to·you

11 and this will·be·himself to·you⁺ ¬firstfruits of·¬gifts⁺ of·them off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬lids⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·you I·have·given °them and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you and to·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·you with of·you °law ⁼eternal all ⁼¬clean in to·the ⁼house of·you will·¬eat·himself °them

12 all ⁼¬firstfruits of·¬olive·oil and all ⁼¬firstfruits of·wine and of·¬grain ¬firstfruits of·them °whatever⁺ iᵮ they·should·give to·the ⁼lord to·you I·have·given °them

13 the⁺ ⁼¬first·produces⁺ ⁼all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ in to·the ⁼earth of·them °whatever⁺ iᵮ they·should·¬bear to·lord to·you will·be·himself all ⁼¬clean in to·the ⁼house of·you will·¬eat·himself °them

14 all ⁼having·self-¬taken·an·oath in to·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·you will·be·himself

15 and all ⁼¬opening·up °motherhood off of·all ⁼flesh °which⁺ they·¬bring·to to·lord off of·human ¬until of·¬animal to·you will·be·himself but or to·¬ransoms⁺ will·be·¬ransomed the⁺ ⁼¬firstborn⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬firstborn⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬unclean⁺ you·will·¬ransom·yourself

16 and the ⁼¬redemption of·him off of·¬of·a·month the ⁼¬price five of·shekels⁺ ¬according·to °the ⁼shekel ⁼the ⁼holy twenty ¬oboluses⁺ they·are

17 ¬but °¬firstborn⁺ of·calves⁺ and °¬firstborn⁺ of·sheep⁺ and °¬firstborn⁺ of·¬goats⁺ not you·will·¬ransom·yourself holy⁺ is and °the ⁼blood of·them you·will·¬pour·on unto °the ⁼¬altar and °the ⁼¬fat you·will·¬carry·up °¬yield to °¬aroma of·¬aroma to·lord

18 and °the⁺ ⁼meats⁺ will·be·himself to·you ¬as and the ⁼¬breast of·the ⁼¬lid and ¬according·to °the ⁼arm ⁼the ⁼¬right to·you will·be·himself

19 all ⁼¬choice·portion of·the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ °whatever⁺ iᵮ they·should·¬remove the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·lord to·you I·have·given and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·you and to·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·you with of·you °law ⁼eternal ¬covenant of·¬salt ⁼eternal is ¬before of·lord to·you and to·the ⁼seed of·you with °you

20 and spoke lord unto °Aharon in to·the ⁼earth of·them not you·will·¬inherit and ¬part not will·be·himself to·you in to·them ¬that I* ¬part of·you and ¬inheritance of·you in to·middle of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

21 and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Levi ¬¡see! I·have·given °all ⁼¬tithe in to·Yisra’el in to·¬lot anti of·the⁺ ⁼¬ministries⁺ of·them °whatever⁺ they they·¬minister °¬ministry in to·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

22 and not they·will·come·unto·themselves still the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness to·take °sin ⁼¬deadly

23 and will·¬minister the ⁼¬Levite he °the ⁼¬ministry of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and they they·will·take·themselves °the⁺ ⁼¬sins⁺ of·them °law ⁼eternal to °the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·them and in to·middle of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el not they·will·¬inherit °¬inheritance

24 ¬that °the⁺ ⁼¬tithe⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °whatever⁺ iᵮ they·should·¬separate to·lord °¬choice·portion I·have·given to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ in to·¬lot through °this I·have·¬said to·them in to·middle of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el not they·will·¬inherit °¬lot

25 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

26 and to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ you·will·speak and you·will·¬say unto °them ifᵮ you⁺·should·take ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °the ⁼¬tithe which I·have·given to·you⁺ ¬from of·them in to·¬lot and you⁺·will·¬remove you⁺ off of·him °¬choice·portion to·lord °¬tithe off of·the ⁼¬tithe

27 and will·be·¬counted to·you⁺ °the⁺ ⁼¬choice·portions⁺ of·you⁺ as ¬grain off of·¬threshing-floor and °¬choice·portion off of·¬winepress

28 thus you⁺·will·¬remove and you⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼¬choice·portions⁺ of·lord off of·all⁺ ⁼¬tithe⁺ of·you⁺ °whatever⁺ ifᵮ you⁺·should·take ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and you⁺·will·give off of·them °¬choice·portion to·lord ⁼Aharon ⁼the ⁼priest

29 off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬gifts⁺ of·you⁺ you⁺·will·¬remove °¬choice·portion to·lord or off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬firstfruitses⁺ °the ⁼having·self-made·holy off of·him

30 and you·will·¬say unto °them ¬when you⁺·should·¬remove °the ⁼¬firstfruits off of·him and will·be·¬counted to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ as °¬offspring off of·¬threshing-floor and as °¬offspring off of·¬winepress

31 and you⁺·will·¬eat·yourselves⁺ °it in to·all ⁼¬place you⁺ and the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·you⁺ ¬that ¬wage ⁼this to·you⁺ is anti of·the⁺ ⁼¬ministries⁺ of·you⁺ of·the·ones⁺ in to·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

32 and not you⁺·will·take·yourselves⁺ through °it °sin ¬that iᵮ you⁺·should·¬remove °the ⁼¬firstfruits off of·him and °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el not you⁺·will·¬profane so·that ńot you⁺·should·die·off

19 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh and °Aharon saying

2 this ⁼the ⁼¬distinction of·the ⁼law °whatever⁺ ¬directed lord ⁼saying ꜝspeak to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and ꜝlet·them·take⁺ unto °you °¬heifer ⁼¬fiery·red ⁼¬blameless who not has in to·her °¬blemish and to·which not was·¬put·on upon °her ¬yoke

3 and you·will·give °her unto °¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼priest and they·will·¬lead·out °her out of·the ⁼¬barracks to °¬place ⁼¬clean and they·will·¬slaughter °her ¬before of·him

4 and will·take·himself ¬Eleazar off of·the ⁼blood of·her and will·¬sprinkle ¬opposite of·the ⁼face of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness off of·the ⁼blood of·her seven·times

5 and they·will·¬burn °her ¬in·front·of of·him and °the ⁼leather and °the⁺ ⁼meats⁺ of·her and °the ⁼blood of·her wiŧh to·the ⁼¬dung of·her will·be·¬burned

6 and will·take·himself the ⁼priest °¬wood ⁼cedar and °hyssop and °¬scarlet and they·will·throw·in to °middle of·the ⁼¬burning of·the ⁼¬heifer

7 and will·¬wash °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·him the ⁼priest and will·¬wash·himself °the ⁼body of·him to·water and with °these⁺ will·come·to·himself to °the ⁼¬barracks and ¬unclean will·be·himself the ⁼priest ¬until of·¬evening

8 and the ⁼¬burning °her will·¬wash °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·him and will·¬wash·himself °the ⁼body of·him and ¬unclean will·be·himself ¬until of·¬evening

9 and will·¬assemble human ⁼¬clean °the·one °¬ashes of·the ⁼¬heifer and will·¬put·aside out of·the ⁼¬barracks to °¬place ⁼¬clean and will·be·himself to·the ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to °¬preservation water of·¬sprinkling ¬purification is

10 and will·¬wash °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ the ⁼¬assembling °the ⁼¬pile·of·ashes of·the ⁼¬heifer and ¬unclean will·be·himself ¬until of·¬evening and will·be·himself to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and to·the⁺ ⁼self-¬joining·up·with ⁼¬proselytes⁺ °law ⁼eternal

11 the ⁼self-touching of·the ⁼having·died of·all ⁼soul of·human ¬unclean will·be·himself seven °days⁺

12 this will·be·¬purified to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼third and to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh and ¬clean will·be·himself ifᵮ then ńot should·be·¬purified to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼third and to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh not ¬clean will·be·himself

13 all ⁼the ⁼self-touching of·the ⁼having·died off of·soul of·human ifᵮ should·die·off and ńot should·be·¬purified °the ⁼¬tent of·lord ¬stained will·be·¬obliterated the ⁼soul ⁼that out °Yisra’el ¬that water of·¬sprinkling not was·¬sprinkled·about upon °him ¬unclean is still the ⁼¬impurity of·him in to·him is

14 and this ⁼the ⁼law ⁼human ifᵮ should·die·off in to·house all ⁼the ⁼self-¬entering to °the ⁼house and °whatever⁺ is in to·the ⁼house °¬unclean⁺ will·be·himself seven °days⁺

15 and all ⁼¬vessel ⁼having·self-¬opened °whatever⁺ ¬not! °¬chain has·¬bandaged·himself upon to·him °¬unclean⁺ is

16 and all ⁼which ifᵮ should·touch·himself upon of·face ⁼the ⁼¬plain of·trauma-dead or of·corpse or of·bone ⁼human or of·¬tomb seven °days⁺ ¬unclean will·be·himself

17 and they·will·take·themselves to·the ⁼¬unclean off of·the ⁼¬pile·of·ashes ⁼the ⁼having·self-¬burned of·the ⁼¬purification and they·will·¬pour·out upon °her °water ⁼living to °¬vessel

18 and will·take·himself °hyssop and will·baptize to °the ⁼water man ⁼¬clean and will·¬sprinkle·about upon °the ⁼house and upon °the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ and upon °the⁺ ⁼souls⁺ whatever⁺ ifᵮ they·should·be there and upon °the·one °having·self-touched of·the ⁼bone ⁼the ⁼human or of·the ⁼trauma-dead or of·the ⁼having·died or of·the ⁼¬tomb

19 and will·¬sprinkle·about the ⁼¬clean upon °the ⁼¬unclean in to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼third and in to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh and will·be·¬purified to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh and will·¬wash °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·him and will·¬wash·himself to·water and ¬unclean will·be·himself ¬until of·¬evening

20 and human ⁼which ifᵮ should·be·¬stained and ńot should·be·¬purified will·be·¬rooted·out the ⁼soul ⁼that out of·middle of·the ⁼¬synagogue ¬that °the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ of·lord ¬stained ¬that water of·¬sprinkling not was·¬sprinkled·about upon °him ¬unclean is

21 and will·be·himself to·you⁺ °law ⁼eternal and the ⁼¬sprinkling·about water of·¬sprinkling will·¬wash °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·him and the ⁼self-touching of·the ⁼water of·the ⁼¬sprinkling ¬unclean will·be·himself ¬until of·¬evening

22 and of·all ⁼which ifᵮ should·touch·himself of·it the ⁼¬unclean °¬unclean will·be·himself and the ⁼soul ⁼the ⁼self-touching ¬unclean will·be·himself ¬until of·¬evening

20 and they·came the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue to °the ⁼¬deserted Sin in to·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼first and ¬stayed the ⁼people in Kadēs and ¬deceased there Mariam and was·¬buried there

2 and not was water to·the ⁼¬synagogue and they·were·¬gathered upon °Mosheh and °Aharon

3 and ¬reviled·himself the ⁼people unto °Mosheh saying I·wished we·died·off in to·the ⁼¬destruction of·the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·us ¬before of·lord

4 and so·that what you⁺·¬led °the ⁼¬synagogue of·lord to °the ⁼¬deserted ⁼this to·kill·off °us and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·us

5 and so·that what °this you⁺·¬led °us out of·Egypt to·self-¬come to °the ⁼¬place ⁼the ⁼¬evil ⁼this ¬place ¬whither not seeds·himself not·then ¬fig·trees⁺ not·then vines⁺ not·then ¬pomegranates⁺ not·then water is to·drink

6 and came Mosheh and Aharon off of·face of·the ⁼¬synagogue upon °the ⁼¬door of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness and they·¬collapsed upon °face and was·seen the ⁼glory of·lord unto °them

7 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

8 ꜝtake °the ⁼¬rod and ꜝ¬hold·an·assembly °the ⁼¬synagogue you and Aharon ⁼the ⁼brother of·you and ꜝspeak⁺ unto °the ⁼rock ¬before of·them and will·give °the⁺ ⁼waters⁺ of·her and you⁺·will·¬bring to·them water out of·the ⁼rock and you⁺·will·¬water °the ⁼¬synagogue and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·them

9 and took Mosheh °the ⁼¬rod ⁼the·one ¬opposite of·lord ¬as ¬directed lord

10 and ¬assembled Mosheh and Aharon °the ⁼¬synagogue ¬opposite of·the ⁼rock and told unto °them ꜝhear⁺ of·me the⁺ ⁼¬disobedient⁺ ńot out of·the ⁼rock ⁼this we·will·¬lead·out to·you⁺ water

11 and ¬lifting·up ⁼Mosheh °the ⁼hand of·him ¬struck °the ⁼rock to·the ⁼¬rod ¬twice and came·out water ⁼much and drank the ⁼¬synagogue and the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·them

12 and told lord unto °Mosheh and °Aharon ¬that not you⁺·trusted to·make·holy °me ¬in·front·of of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el through °this not you⁺·will·¬bring·in you⁺ °the ⁼¬synagogue ⁼this to °the ⁼earth ⁼which I·have·given to·them

13 this ⁼water of·¬dispute ¬that they·were·¬reviled the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬before of·lord and was·made·holy in to·them

14 and missioned·off Mosheh °announcers⁺ out Kadēs unto °king Edōm saying °¬these⁺ says the ⁼brother of·you Yisra’el you you·¬know·yourself °all ⁼the ⁼¬toil ⁼the ⁼finding °us

15 and they·¬came the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us to °Egypt and we·¬were·a·stranger in to·Egypt °days⁺ ⁼¬greater⁺ and they·did·evil °us the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us

16 and we·¬cried·out unto °lord and ¬listened·to lord of·the ⁼voice of·us and missioning·off °announcer ¬led·out °us out of·Egypt and now we·are in Kadēs to·city out of·¬part of·the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·you

17 we·will·¬pass·by·ourselves through of·the ⁼earth of·you not we·will·¬pass·through·ourselves through of·fields⁺ not·then through of·vineyards⁺ not·then we·will·drink·ourselves °water out of·¬pit of·you to·¬road ⁼kingly we·will·¬travel·ourselves not we·will·¬turn·from °¬right⁺ not·then °¬left⁺ ¬until iᵮ we·should·¬pass·by °the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·you

18 and told unto °him Edōm not you·will·¬pass·through·yourself through myˊ if then ńot in to·war I·will·come·out·myself to °¬meeting to·you

19 and they·say to·him the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬from °the ⁼mountain we·will·¬pass·by·ourselves ifᵮ then of·the ⁼water of·you we·should·drink I* also and the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ I·will·give °¬honor to·you but the ⁼¬thing ⁼no·one is ¬from °the ⁼mountain we·will·¬pass·by·ourselves

20 the·one then told not you·will·¬pass·through·yourself through myˊ and came·out Edōm to °¬meeting to·him in to·¬crowd ⁼¬weighty and in to·hand ⁼¬strong

21 and not willed Edōm to·give to·the ⁼Yisra’el to·¬pass·by through of·the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·him and ¬turned·from Yisra’el off of·him

22 and they·¬took·away out Kadēs and they·¬came·themselves the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue to Ōr ⁼the ⁼mountain

23 and told lord unto °Mosheh and °Aharon in Ōr ⁼the ⁼mountain upon of·the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·earth Edōm saying

24 ꜝlet·be·¬added Aharon unto °the ⁼people of·him ¬that not ńot you⁺·should·come·to to °the ⁼earth ⁼which I·have·given to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬because you⁺·¬provoked °me upon of·the ⁼water of·the ⁼¬reviling

25 ꜝtake °the ⁼Aharon and °¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼son of·him and ꜝ¬pull·up °them to Ōr ⁼the ⁼mountain ¬before of·all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue

26 and ꜝ¬strip °Aharon °the ⁼robe of·him and ꜝ¬put·on °¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼son of·him and Aharon ⁼¬added ꜝlet·die·off there

27 and did Mosheh ¬as ¬directed lord and ¬pulled·up °him to Ōr ⁼the ⁼mountain ¬in·front·of of·all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue

28 and ¬stripped °Aharon °the⁺ ⁼cloaks⁺ of·him and ¬put·on °them °¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼son of·him and died·off Aharon upon of·the ⁼¬head of·the ⁼mountain and ¬came Mosheh and ¬Eleazar out of·the ⁼mountain

29 and saw all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue ¬that was·¬released Aharon and they·¬wept °the ⁼Aharon thirty °days⁺ all ⁼house of·Yisra’el

21 and heard the ⁼¬Canaan ⁼king Arad the ⁼¬dwelling ¬according·to °the ⁼¬deserted came for Yisra’el °¬road Atharin and warred unto °Yisra’el and they·¬carried·away·captive out of·them °¬captivity

2 and ¬prayed·himself Yisra’el °¬vow to·lord and told ifᵮ to·me you·should·¬deliver °the ⁼people ⁼this ⁼¬under·one's·hand I·will·¬take·an·oath °him and °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·him

3 and ¬listened·to lord of·the ⁼voice of·Yisra’el and ¬delivered °the·one ¬??? °¬under·one's·hand of·him and ¬took·an·oath °him and °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·him and they·¬called °the ⁼name of·the ⁼¬place ⁼that °¬devoted

4 and ¬taking·away out Ōr ⁼the ⁼mountain °¬road upon °sea ⁼¬Red·Sea they·¬surrounded °earth Edōm and ¬was·faint-hearted the ⁼people in to·the ⁼¬road

5 and ¬slandered the ⁼people unto °the ⁼God and ¬according·to of·Mosheh saying so·that what you·¬led·out °us out of·Egypt to·kill·off °us in to·the ⁼¬deserted ¬that not is bread not·then water then the ⁼soul of·us ¬was·angry in to·the ⁼bread ⁼the ⁼¬empty

6 and missioned·off lord to °the ⁼people °the⁺ ⁼¬snakes⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼putting·to·death and they·¬bit °the ⁼people and died·off people ⁼much of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

7 and self-¬coming ⁼the ⁼people unto °Mosheh they·said ¬that we·sinned ¬that we·¬slandered ¬according·to of·the ⁼lord and ¬according·to of·you to·¬pray therefore unto °lord and ꜝlet·¬remove off of·us °the ⁼¬snake and ¬prayed·himself Mosheh unto °lord about of·the ⁼people

8 and told lord unto °Mosheh ꜝdo to·yourself °¬snake and ꜝ¬place °him upon of·sign and will·be·himself ifᵮ should·¬bite ¬snake °human all ⁼the ⁼having·self-¬bitten ⁼seeing °him will·live·himself

9 and did Mosheh °¬snake ⁼copper and stood °him upon of·sign and was·generated·himself ¬when ¬bit ¬snake °human and ¬looked·upon upon °the ⁼¬snake ⁼the ⁼copper and lived

10 and they·¬took·away the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·¬inserted·against in Ōbōth

11 and ¬expelling out Ōbōth they·¬inserted·against in ¬??? out of·the·one ¬other·side in to·the ⁼¬deserted which is ¬according·to °face Mōab ¬according·to °¬easts⁺ of·sun

12 ¬from·there they·¬took·away and they·¬inserted·against to °¬valley Zaret

13 and ¬from·there ¬taking·away they·¬inserted·against to °the·one ¬other·side Arnōn in to·the ⁼¬deserted °the ⁼¬protruding off of·the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·the⁺ Amorraiōn is for Arnōn ¬regions⁺ Mōab ¬each °middle Mōab and ¬each °middle of·the Amorraiou

14 through °this says·himself in to·¬scroll war of·the ⁼lord °the Zōob ¬kindled and °the⁺ ⁼¬brooks⁺ Arnōn

15 and °the⁺ ⁼¬brooks⁺ ¬appointed to·¬settle to·¬Er and ¬joins·up·with·himself to·the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ Mōab

16 and ¬from·there the ⁼¬well ⁼this is the ⁼¬well °which told lord unto °Mosheh ꜝ¬assemble °the ⁼people and I·will·give to·them water to·drink

17 ŧhen ¬sang Yisra’el °the ⁼¬song ⁼this upon of·the ⁼¬well you⁺·¬originate to·it

18 ¬well they·¬dug °it ¬rulers⁺ they·¬quarried °it kings⁺ of·nations⁺ in to·the ⁼kingdom of·them in to·the·one to·be·lord of·them and off of·¬well to Manthanain

19 and off Manthanain to Naaliēl and off Naaliēl to Bamōth

20 and off Bamōth to ¬??? which is in to·the ⁼¬plain Mōab off of·¬head of·the ⁼having·self-¬dressed·stone °the ⁼looking ¬according·to °face of·the ⁼¬deserted

21 and missioned·off Mosheh °¬ambassadors⁺ unto Sēōn ⁼king Amorraiōn to·sayings⁺ ⁼peaceful⁺ saying

22 we·will·¬pass·by·ourselves through of·the ⁼earth of·you to·the ⁼¬road we·will·¬travel·ourselves not we·will·¬turn·from not·also to °field not·also to °vineyard not we·will·drink·ourselves water out of·¬well of·you to·¬road ⁼kingly we·will·¬travel·ourselves ¬until we·should·¬pass·by °the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·you

23 and not gave Sēōn to·the ⁼Yisra’el to·¬pass·by through of·the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·him and ¬assembled Sēōn °all ⁼the ⁼people of·him and came·out to·self-¬deploy to·the ⁼Yisra’el to °the ⁼¬deserted and came to Iassa and ¬deployed·himself to·the ⁼Yisra’el

24 and ¬struck °him Yisra’el to·murder of·¬sword and they·¬mastered of·the ⁼earth of·him off Arnōn ¬until Iabok ¬until of·sons⁺ Amman ¬that Iazēr ¬regions⁺ of·sons⁺ Ammōn is

25 and took Yisra’el °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼these⁺ and ¬dwelled Yisra’el in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·the⁺ Amorraiōn in Esebōn and in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬falling·in·with to·her

26 is for Esebōn city Sēōn ⁼the ⁼king of·the⁺ Amorraiōn and this warred °king Mōab °the ⁼¬before and they·took °all ⁼the ⁼earth of·him off Aroēr ¬until Arnōn

27 through °this they·will·¬say the⁺ ⁼¬enigma·speakers⁺ ꜝcome⁺ to Esebōn so·that should·be·¬built and should·be·¬prepared city Sēōn

28 ¬that °fire came·out out Esebōn ¬flame out of·city Sēōn and ¬devoured ¬until Mōab and ¬swallowed °¬monuments⁺ Arnōn

29 ¬woe! to·you Mōab you·¬destroyed·yourself people Chamōs they·were·¬payed the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·them to·self-¬save and the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·them ¬captive⁺ to·the ⁼king of·the⁺ Amorraiōn Sēōn

30 and the ⁼seed of·them will·¬destroy·himself Esebōn ¬until Daibōn and the⁺ ⁼women⁺ still they·¬burned·besides °fire upon Mōab

31 ¬dwelled then Yisra’el in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·the⁺ Amorraiōn

32 and missioned·off Mosheh to·self-¬survey °the Iazēr and they·¬grasped·themselves °her and °the⁺ ⁼¬villages⁺ of·her and they·threw·out °the Amorraion ⁼the ⁼¬dwelling there

33 and ¬turning they·¬ascended °¬road ⁼the·one to Basan and came·out Ōg ⁼king of·the Basan to °¬meeting to·them and all ⁼the ⁼people of·him to °war to Edrain

34 and told lord unto °Mosheh ńot you·should·be·afraid °him ¬that to °the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·you I·have·¬delivered °him and °all ⁼the ⁼people of·him and °all ⁼the ⁼earth of·him and you·will·do to·him ¬as you·did to·the Sēōn ⁼king of·the⁺ Amorraiōn which ¬dwelled in Esebōn

35 and ¬struck °him and °the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·him and °all ⁼the ⁼people of·him ¬until of·the·one ńot to·¬leave·behind of·him °¬taking·alive and they·¬inherited °the ⁼earth of·them

22 and ¬taking·away ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el they·¬inserted·against upon of·wests⁺ Mōab ¬from °the ⁼¬Jordan ¬according·to °¬Jericho

2 and seeing ⁼¬Balak ⁼son Sepfōr °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ did Yisra’el to·the Amorraiō

3 and was·afraid Mōab °the ⁼people ¬very ¬that many⁺ they·were and ¬was·angry Mōab off of·face of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

4 and told Mōab to·the ⁼¬council·of·elders of·¬Midian now will·¬lick·up the ⁼¬synagogue ⁼this °all⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬surrounding of·us as may·¬lick·up the ⁼calf °the⁺ ⁼green⁺ out of·the ⁼¬plain and ¬Balak ⁼son Sepfōr ⁼king Mōab was ¬according·to °the ⁼¬time ⁼that

5 and missioned·off °¬ambassadors⁺ unto °¬Balaam ⁼son of·¬Beor Fathoura which is upon of·the ⁼¬river of·earth of·sons⁺ of·people of·him to·call °him saying ¬¡see! people has·come·out out of·Egypt and ¬¡see! ¬covered °the ⁼¬face of·the ⁼earth and this ¬lies·in·wait·himself self-having of·me

6 and now ¬come ꜝ¬curse·yourself to·me °the ⁼people ⁼this ¬that ¬is·strong this or we ifᵮ we·should·be·able·ourselves to·¬strike out of·them and I·will·throw·out °them out of·the ⁼earth ¬that I·have·¬seen °which⁺ ifᵮ you·should·¬praise you they·have·¬praised·themselves and °which⁺ ifᵮ you·will·¬curse·yourself you they·have·¬cursed·themselves

7 and was·¬travelled the ⁼¬council·of·elders Mōab and the ⁼¬council·of·elders of·¬Midian and the⁺ ⁼¬oracles⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them and they·came unto °¬Balaam and they·told to·him °the⁺ ⁼¬declarations⁺ of·¬Balak

2 and they·called °them upon to·the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ of·them and ¬ate the ⁼people of·the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·them and they·¬worshipped to·the⁺ ⁼idols⁺ of·them

6 and ¬¡see! human of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el coming ¬brought·near °the ⁼brother of·him unto °the ⁼¬Midian ¬in·front·of of·Mosheh and ¬before of·all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el they then they·¬wept ¬from °the ⁼¬door of·the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness

8 came·to ¬after of·the ⁼human ⁼the ⁼Yisra’elite to °the·one °¬furnace and ¬pierced °¬both⁺ °the·one also °human ⁼the ⁼Yisra’elite and °the ⁼woman through of·the ⁼motherhood of·her and ¬ceased·himself the ⁼¬plague off of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

9 and they·were·generated·themselves the⁺ ⁼having·died in to·the ⁼¬plague four⁺ and twenty thousands⁺

10 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

14 then the ⁼name of·the ⁼human ⁼the ⁼Yisra’elite ⁼the ⁼having·¬struck which was·¬struck with of·the ⁼¬Midian Zambri ⁼son Salō ¬ruler of·house of·paternity of·the⁺ ⁼¬Simeons⁺

15 and name to·the ⁼woman ⁼the ⁼¬Midian ⁼the ⁼having·¬struck Chasbi ⁼daughter Sour ⁼¬ruler of·nation Ommōth ⁼house of·paternity is of·the·ones⁺ ¬Midian

16 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying ꜝspeak to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el saying

17 ꜝ¬hate⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼¬Midians⁺ and ꜝ¬strike⁺ °them

18 ¬that they·¬hate they to·you⁺ in to·¬deceit °whatever⁺ they·¬deceive °you⁺ through Fogōr and through Chasbi °daughter of·¬ruler of·¬Midian °sister of·them °the ⁼having·¬struck in to·the ⁼day of·the ⁼¬plague through Fogōr

26 and was·generated·himself with °the ⁼¬plague and spoke lord unto °Mosheh and unto °¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼priest saying

2 ꜝtake °the ⁼¬beginning of·all ⁼¬synagogue of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el off of·twenty·years and ¬above ¬according·to °houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·them all ⁼the ⁼self-¬departing to·self-¬deploy in to·Yisra’el

3 and spoke Mosheh and ¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼priest in to·¬wilderness Mōab upon of·the ⁼¬Jordan ¬according·to ¬Jericho saying

4 off of·twenty·years and ¬above °which ⁼¬way ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el the⁺ ⁼coming·out out of·Egypt

10 °tenth ⁼tenth to·the ⁼¬lamb ⁼the ⁼one to °the·ones⁺ seven °¬lambs⁺

11 and °¬1·winter·yearling out of·¬goats⁺ °one about of·sin to·self-¬appease about of·you⁺ ¬but °the·one about of·the ⁼sin ⁼the ⁼¬atonement and the ⁼¬bringing·of·a·whole·burnt-offering ⁼the·one through of·all the ⁼¬sacrifice of·her and the ⁼¬libation of·her ¬according·to °the ⁼¬amalgamation to °¬aroma of·¬aroma °¬yield to·lord

12 and to·the ⁼five-and-tenth ⁼day of·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼seventh ⁼this ¬selected ⁼holy will·be·himself to·you⁺ °all ⁼work ⁼¬servile not you⁺·will·do and you⁺·will·¬keep·a·festival °her ⁼¬festival to·lord seven °days⁺

13 and you⁺·will·¬bring·near °¬burnt·offerings⁺ ⁼¬yields⁺ to °¬aroma of·¬aroma to·lord to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼first °calves⁺ out of·¬oxes⁺ °three⁺ and ten °¬rams⁺ two °¬lambs⁺ ⁼¬of·a·year⁺ ten °four⁺ ¬blameless⁺ they·will·be·themselves

14 the⁺ ⁼¬sacrifices⁺ of·them ¬fine·flour ⁼having·been·¬prepared in to·¬olive·oil °three⁺ ⁼tenth⁺ to·the ⁼calf ⁼the ⁼one to·the·ones⁺ ¬thirteen to·calves⁺ and two °tenth⁺ to·the ⁼¬ram ⁼the ⁼one upon °the·ones⁺ two °¬rams⁺

30 and spoke Mosheh to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬according·to °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ¬ordered·himself lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

2 and spoke Mosheh unto °the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·Yisra’el saying this ⁼the ⁼¬declaration °which ¬directed lord

3 ⁼human ⁼human ⁼which iᵮ should·¬pray·himself °¬vow to·lord or should·¬swear °¬oath or should·¬determine·himself to·¬enactment about of·the ⁼soul of·him not will·¬profane °the ⁼¬declaration of·him °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ifᵮ should·come·out out of·the ⁼mouth of·him will·do

4 ifᵮ then woman should·¬pray·himself °¬vow to·lord or should·¬determine·himself °¬enactment in to·the ⁼house of·the ⁼father of·her in to·the ⁼youth of·her

5 and should·hear the ⁼father of·her °the⁺ ⁼¬vows⁺ of·her and °the⁺ ⁼¬enactments⁺ of·her °which⁺ ¬determined·himself ¬according·to of·the ⁼soul of·her and should·¬remain·silent of·her the ⁼father and they·will·stand·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vows⁺ of·her and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬enactments⁺ °which⁺ ¬determined·himself ¬according·to of·the ⁼soul of·her they·will·¬stay to·her

6 ifᵮ then ¬disagreing should·¬disagree the ⁼father of·her to·which iᵮ to·day should·hear °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vows⁺ of·her and °the⁺ ⁼¬enactments⁺ ⁼which⁺ ¬determined·himself ¬according·to of·the ⁼soul of·her not they·will·stand·themselves and lord will·¬clean °her ¬that ¬disagreed the ⁼father of·her

7 ifᵮ then self-generated should·be·generated·himself to·man and the⁺ ⁼¬vows⁺ of·her upon to·her ¬according·to °the ⁼¬distinction of·the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·her °which⁺ ¬determined·himself ¬according·to of·the ⁼soul of·her

8 and should·hear the ⁼man of·her and should·¬remain·silent to·her ⁼which iᵮ to·day should·hear and thus they·will·stand·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vows⁺ of·her and the⁺ ⁼¬enactments⁺ of·her °which⁺ ¬determined·himself ¬according·to of·the ⁼soul of·her they·will·stand·themselves

9 ifᵮ then ¬disagreing should·¬disagree the ⁼man of·her to·which iᵮ to·day should·hear all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vows⁺ of·her and the⁺ ⁼¬enactments⁺ of·her °which⁺ ¬determined·himself ¬according·to of·the ⁼soul of·her not they·will·¬stay ¬that the ⁼man ¬disagreed off of·her and lord will·¬clean °her

10 and ¬vow of·widow and of·having·self-thrown·out °whatever⁺ iᵮ should·¬pray·himself ¬according·to of·the ⁼soul of·her they·will·¬stay to·her

11 ifᵮ then in to·the ⁼house of·the ⁼man of·her the ⁼¬vow of·her or the ⁼¬enactment ¬according·to of·the ⁼soul of·her with of·¬oath

12 and should·hear the ⁼man of·her and should·¬remain·silent to·her and ńot should·¬disagree to·her and they·will·stand·themselves all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vows⁺ of·her and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬enactments⁺ of·her °which⁺ ¬determined·himself ¬according·to of·the ⁼soul of·her they·will·stand·themselves ¬according·to of·her

13 ifᵮ then ¬taking·away should·¬take·away the ⁼man of·her to·which iᵮ to·day should·hear °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ifᵮ should·come·out out of·the⁺ ⁼lips⁺ of·her ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬vows⁺ of·her and ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼¬enactments⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬according·to of·the ⁼soul of·her not will·¬stay to·her the ⁼man of·her ¬took·away and lord will·¬clean °her

14 all ⁼¬vow and all ⁼¬oath of·¬chain to·do·evil °soul the ⁼man of·her will·stand to·her and the ⁼man of·her will·¬take·away

15 ifᵮ then ¬·quiet should·¬remain·silent to·her °day out of·day and will·stand to·her °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬vows⁺ of·her and °the⁺ ⁼¬enactments⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ upon of·her will·stand to·her ¬that ¬was·quiet to·her ⁼the ⁼day ⁼which heard

16 ifᵮ then ¬taking·away should·¬take·away of·her with °the ⁼day ⁼which heard and will·take·himself °the ⁼sin of·him

17 these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼just·deeds⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ¬ordered·himself lord to·the ⁼Mosheh ¬each °middle of·man and of·woman of·him and ¬each °middle of·father and of·daughter in to·youth in to·house of·father

31 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

2 ꜝ¬avenge °the ⁼¬vengeance of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·the⁺ ⁼¬Midians⁺ and °¬last you·will·be·¬added unto °the ⁼people of·you

3 and spoke Mosheh unto °the ⁼people saying ꜝ¬completely·arm⁺ out of·you⁺ °men⁺ to·self-¬deploy ¬before of·lord upon °¬Midian to·¬pay °¬vengeance ¬from of·the ⁼lord to·the ⁼¬Midian

4 °thousand⁺ out of·¬tribe °thousand⁺ out of·¬tribe out of·all⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·Yisra’el ꜝmission·off⁺ to·self-¬deploy

5 and they·¬counted·out out of·the⁺ ⁼thousands⁺ of·Yisra’el °thousand⁺ out of·¬tribe twelve thousands⁺ having·self-¬armed·oneself to °¬battle·array

6 and missioned·off °them Mosheh °thousand⁺ out of·¬tribe °thousand⁺ out of·¬tribe wiŧh to·ability of·them and Finees ⁼son of·¬Eleazar ⁼son ⁼Aharon ⁼the ⁼priest and °the⁺ ⁼¬vessels⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼holy⁺ and the⁺ ⁼trumpets⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬cheers⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼hands⁺ of·them

7 and they·¬deployed·themselves upon °¬Midian ¬as ¬ordered·himself lord to·the ⁼Mosheh and they·killed·off °all ⁼¬male

8 and °the·ones⁺ kings⁺ of·¬Midian they·killed·off ¬together to·the⁺ ⁼trauma-deads⁺ of·them and °the Euin and °the Sour and °the Rokom and °the Our and °the Robok five kings⁺ of·¬Midian and °the ⁼¬Balaam ⁼son ⁼¬Beor they·killed·off in to·sword wiŧh to·the⁺ ⁼trauma-deads⁺ of·them

9 and they·¬despoiled °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·¬Midian and °the ⁼¬accoutrements of·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·them and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬procured⁺ of·them and °the ⁼ability of·them they·¬despoiled

10 and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ of·them °the·ones⁺ in to·the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬residences⁺ of·them they·¬filled·up in to·fire

11 and they·took °all ⁼the ⁼¬plunder and °all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬plunders⁺ of·them off of·human ¬until of·¬animal

12 and they·¬brought unto °Mosheh and unto °¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼priest and unto °all⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °the ⁼¬captivity and °the⁺ ⁼¬plunders⁺ and °the ⁼¬plunder to °the ⁼¬barracks to °¬wilderness Mōab which is upon of·the ⁼¬Jordan ¬according·to °¬Jericho

13 and came·out Mosheh and ¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼priest and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·the ⁼¬synagogue to °¬meeting to·them out of·the ⁼¬barracks

14 and was·enraged Mosheh upon to·the⁺ ⁼¬overseers⁺ of·the ⁼ability to·¬military·officers⁺ and to·¬centurions⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼self-coming out of·the ⁼¬battle·array of·the ⁼war

15 and told to·them Mosheh so·that °what you⁺·¬captured·alive °all ⁼suckler

16 these⁺ for they·were to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬according·to °the ⁼¬declaration of·¬Balaam of·the·one to·¬leave and to·¬overlook °the ⁼¬declaration of·lord ¬because·of Fogōr and was·generated·himself the ⁼¬plague in to·the ⁼¬synagogue of·lord

17 and now ꜝkill·off⁺ °all ⁼¬male in to·all ⁼the ⁼¬chattel and °all ⁼woman who has·known °¬bed of·virulent ꜝkill·off⁺

18 °all ⁼the ⁼¬chattel of·the⁺ ⁼women⁺ who not has·¬seen °¬bed of·virulent ꜝ¬capture·alive⁺ °them

19 and you⁺ ꜝ¬insert·against⁺ out of·the ⁼¬barracks seven of·day all ⁼the ⁼¬killing and the ⁼self-touching of·the ⁼having·self-been will·be·¬purified to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼third and to·the ⁼day ⁼the ⁼seventh you⁺ and the ⁼¬captivity of·you⁺

20 and °all ⁼¬wrap-around and °all ⁼¬vessel ⁼leather and °all ⁼¬work out of·¬goat's and °all ⁼¬vessel ⁼¬wooden you⁺·will·¬purify

21 and told ¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼priest unto °the⁺ ⁼men⁺ of·the ⁼ability °the⁺ ⁼self-coming out of·the ⁼¬battle·array of·the ⁼war this ⁼the ⁼just·deed of·the ⁼law which ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

22 ¬but of·the ⁼gold and of·the ⁼silver and of·copper and of·iron and of·¬lead and of·¬tin

23 °all ⁼¬thing which will·¬pass·through·himself in to·fire and will·be·¬cleaned but or to·the ⁼water of·the ⁼¬purification will·be·¬purified and °all⁺ ⁼whatever⁺ ifᵮ ńot should·¬go·through·himself through of·fire will·¬pass·through·himself through of·water

25 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

30 and off of·the ⁼¬half ⁼the·one of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el you·will·take·yourself °one off of·the·ones⁺ fifty off of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and off of·the⁺ ⁼¬oxes⁺ and off of·the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ and off of·the⁺ ⁼donkeys⁺ and off of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and you·will·give °them to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬keeping °the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ in to·the ⁼¬tent of·lord

31 and did Mosheh and ¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼priest ¬as ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

32 and was·been·generated the ⁼¬surplus of·the ⁼¬plunder which they·¬despoiled the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼warriors⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼sheep⁺ six·hundred⁺ ⁼thousands⁺ and seventy and five thousands⁺

47 and took Mosheh off of·the ⁼¬half of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el °the ⁼one off of·the·ones⁺ fifty off of·the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ and off of·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ and gave °them to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬keeping °the⁺ ⁼¬prisons⁺ of·the ⁼¬tent of·lord °which ⁼¬way ¬directed lord to·the ⁼Mosheh

48 and they·came·unto unto °Mosheh all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼having·self-¬appointed to °the⁺ ⁼¬command·of·a·thousands⁺ of·the ⁼ability ¬military·officers⁺ and ¬centurions⁺

49 and they·told unto °Mosheh the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you they·have·taken °the ⁼¬sum of·the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼warriors⁺ ⁼the·ones⁺ ¬from of·us and not has·¬dissented off of·them not·then one

50 and we·have·¬brought·to °the ⁼¬gift to·lord man which found °¬vessel ⁼golden °¬armlet and °¬bracelet and °¬ring and °¬right·armband and °¬wreath to·self-¬appease about of·us ¬before of·lord

51 and took Mosheh and ¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼priest °the ⁼gold ¬from of·them °all ⁼¬vessel ⁼having·self-worked

52 and was·generated·himself all ⁼the ⁼gold ⁼the ⁼¬choice·portion ⁼which they·¬removed to·lord six and ten thousands⁺ and ¬seven·hundred⁺ and fifty shekels⁺ ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼¬military·officers⁺ and ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼¬centurions⁺

53 and the⁺ ⁼men⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼warriors⁺ they·¬despoiled ¬each to·himself

54 and took Mosheh and ¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼priest °the ⁼gold ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼¬military·officers⁺ and ¬from of·the⁺ ⁼¬centurions⁺ and ¬brought·in °them to °the ⁼¬tent of·the ⁼witness °¬memorial of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬before of·lord

32 and ¬animals⁺ ¬multitude was to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Reuben and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Gad °¬multitude ¬very and they·saw °the ⁼¬country Iazēr and °the ⁼¬country Galaad and was the ⁼¬place ⁼¬place to·¬animals⁺

2 and coming·unto ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Reuben and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Gad they·told unto °Mosheh and unto °¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼priest and unto °the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·the ⁼¬synagogue saying

3 Atarōth and Daibōn and Iazēr and ¬??? and Esebōn and Elealē and Sebama and Nabau and Baian

4 °the ⁼earth ⁼which ¬delivered lord ¬before of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el earth ¬grazing·cattle is and to·the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you °¬animals⁺ ¬is·already

5 and they·said if we·found °¬grace ¬before of·you ꜝlet·be·given the ⁼earth ⁼this to·the⁺ ⁼¬slaves⁺ of·you in to·¬possession and ńot you·should·¬cause·to·pass·over °us °the ⁼¬Jordan

6 and told Mosheh to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Gad and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Reuben the⁺ ⁼brothers⁺ of·you⁺ they·¬travel·themselves to °war and you⁺ you⁺·will·¬lower·yourselves⁺ of·him

7 and so·that °what you⁺·¬pervert °the⁺ ⁼¬minds⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ńot to·¬cross to °the ⁼earth ⁼which lord gives to·them

8 not thus they·did the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ when I·missioned·off °them out Kadēs Barnē to·¬observe °the ⁼earth

9 and they·¬ascended °¬valley of·¬bunch·of·grapes and they·¬observed °the ⁼earth and they·¬left °the ⁼heart of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬that ńot they·should·come·to to °the ⁼earth ⁼which gave lord to·them

10 and was·enraged to·¬wrath lord in to·the ⁼day ⁼that and ¬swore saying

11 if they·will·see·themselves the⁺ ⁼humans⁺ ⁼these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬ascending out of·Egypt off of·twenty·years and ¬above the⁺ ⁼self-¬knowing °the ⁼evil and °the ⁼good °the ⁼earth ⁼which I·¬swore to·the ⁼Abraham and to·Yitzchaq and to·Ya‘aqob not for they·¬followed·after·together ¬after of·me

12 ¬but Chaleb ⁼son Iefonnē the ⁼having·self-¬been·separated and Yesou ⁼the·one of·the Nauē ¬that ¬followed·after·together ¬after of·lord

13 and was·enraged to·¬wrath lord upon °the ⁼Yisra’el and ¬staggered °them in to·the ⁼¬deserted forty °years⁺ ¬until was·¬consumed all ⁼the ⁼generation the⁺ ⁼doing °the⁺ ⁼¬evil⁺ ¬before of·lord

14 ¬¡see! you⁺·¬arose anti of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·you⁺ ¬confederation of·humans⁺ ⁼¬sinful⁺ to·¬add still upon °the ⁼¬wrath of·the ⁼raging of·lord upon °Yisra’el

15 ¬that you⁺·will·be·¬turned·away off of·him to·¬add still to·¬leave·behind °him in to·the ⁼¬deserted and you⁺·will·¬act·lawlessly to °¬all ⁼the ⁼¬synagogue ⁼this

16 and they·came·unto to·him and they·said °¬residences⁺ of·sheep⁺ we·should·¬build ¬here to·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·us and °cities⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼¬accoutrementses⁺ of·us

17 and we self-¬arming·oneself ¬advance·guard ¬before⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬until iᵮ we·should·¬bring °them to °the·one of·¬selves⁺ °¬place and will·¬dwell the ⁼¬accoutrements of·us in to·cities⁺ ⁼having·self-walled through °the⁺ ⁼¬dwelling °the ⁼earth

18 not ńot we·should·be·¬turned·away to °the⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·us ¬until iᵮ they·should·be·¬divided·among the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬each to °the ⁼¬inheritance of·him

19 and ¬not·any·more we·should·¬inherit in to·them off of·the·one ¬other·side of·the ⁼¬Jordan and ¬beyond ¬that we·¬cling·to °the⁺ ⁼¬lots⁺ of·us in to·the·one ¬other·side of·the ⁼¬Jordan in to·¬easts⁺

20 and told unto °them Mosheh ifᵮ you⁺·should·do ¬according·to °the ⁼¬declaration ⁼this ifᵮ you⁺·should·¬completely·arm·yourselves⁺ ¬before of·lord to °war

21 and will·¬pass·by·himself of·you⁺ all ⁼¬armed·with·a·large·shield °the ⁼¬Jordan ¬before of·lord ¬until iᵮ should·be·¬obliterated the ⁼¬enemy of·him off of·face of·him

22 and should·be·¬mastered the ⁼earth ¬before of·lord and with °these⁺ you⁺·will·be·¬turned·away and you⁺·will·be·yourselves⁺ ¬innocent⁺ ¬before of·lord and off of·Yisra’el and will·be·himself the ⁼earth ⁼this to·you⁺ in to·¬possession ¬before of·lord

23 ifᵮ then ńot you⁺·should·do thus you⁺·will·sin·yourselves⁺ ¬before of·lord and you⁺·will·know·yourselves⁺ °the ⁼sin of·you⁺ ¬when °you⁺ should·¬grasp °the⁺ ⁼evil⁺

24 and you⁺·will·¬build to·you⁺ to·them °cities⁺ to·the ⁼¬accoutrements of·you⁺ and °¬residences⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·you⁺ and °the ⁼self-¬departing out of·the ⁼mouth of·you⁺ you⁺·will·do

25 and they·told the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Reuben and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Gad unto °Mosheh saying ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you they·will·do ¬as the ⁼lord of·us ¬orders·himself

26 the ⁼¬accoutrements of·us and the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·us and all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·us they·will·be·themselves in to·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ Galaad

27 then the⁺ ⁼¬children⁺ of·you they·will·¬pass·by·themselves all⁺ ⁼having·self-¬armed·oneself and having·self-¬arrayed ¬before of·lord to °the ⁼war ⁼which ⁼¬way the ⁼lord says

28 and ¬commended to·them Mosheh °¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼priest and °Yesou ⁼son Nauē and °the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·paternities⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·Yisra’el

30 ifᵮ then ńot they·should·¬cross having·self-¬armed·oneself with of·you⁺ to °the ⁼war ¬before of·lord and you⁺·will·¬cause·to·pass·over °the ⁼¬accoutrements of·them and °the⁺ ⁼women⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·them °¬before⁺ of·you⁺ to °earth of·¬Canaan and they·will·be·¬inherited·together in to·you⁺ in to·the ⁼earth to·¬Canaan

31 and they·were·¬answered the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Reuben and the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Gad saying °whatever⁺ the ⁼lord says to·the⁺ ⁼¬servants⁺ of·him thus we·will·do

32 we we·will·¬cross·ourselves having·self-¬armed·oneself ¬before of·lord to °earth of·¬Canaan and you⁺·will·give °the ⁼¬possession to·us in to·the·one ¬other·side of·the ⁼¬Jordan

33 and gave to·them Mosheh to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Gad and to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·¬Reuben and to·the ⁼¬half of·¬tribe of·¬Manasseh of·sons⁺ of·Yosef °the ⁼kingdom Sēōn ⁼king Amorraiōn and °the ⁼kingdom Ōg ⁼king of·the Basan °the ⁼earth and °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ wiŧh to·the·ones⁺ to·¬regions⁺ of·her cities⁺ of·the ⁼earth ¬surrounding

39 and was·¬travelled son Machir ⁼son ⁼¬Manasseh to Galaad and took °her and ¬destroyed °the Amorraion ⁼the ⁼¬dwelling in to·her

2 and wrote Mosheh °the⁺ ⁼¬departures⁺ of·them and °the⁺ ⁼¬doorposts⁺ of·them through of·¬declaration of·lord and these⁺ ⁼¬doorposts⁺ of·the ⁼¬journey of·them

3 they·¬took·away out Ramessē to·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼first to·the ⁼five-and-tenth ⁼day of·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼first to·the·one ¬next·day of·the ⁼¬Passover·lamb they·came·out the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el in to·hand ⁼¬high ¬in·front·of of·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺

4 and the⁺ ⁼Egyptians⁺ they·¬buried out of·¬selves⁺ °the⁺ ⁼having·died ⁼all⁺ ⁼which⁺ ¬struck lord °all ⁼¬firstborn in to·earth ⁼Egypt and in to·the⁺ ⁼Gods⁺ of·them did °the ⁼¬vengeance lord

5 and ¬taking·away ⁼the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out Ramessē they·¬inserted·against to Sokchōth

8 and they·¬took·away ¬opposite ¬??? and they·¬crossed °middle of·the ⁼sea to °the ⁼¬deserted and they·were·¬travelled °¬road of·three⁺ ⁼days⁺ through of·the ⁼¬deserted they and they·¬inserted·against in to·¬bitternesses⁺

9 and they·¬took·away out of·¬bitternesses⁺ and they·came to Ailim and in Ailim twelve ¬flows⁺ of·waters⁺ and seventy °¬sticks⁺ of·¬palms⁺ and they·¬inserted·against there ¬from °the ⁼water

38 and ¬ascended Aharon ⁼the ⁼priest through of·¬order of·lord and died·off there in to·the ⁼¬fortieth ⁼year of·the ⁼¬departure of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el out of·earth ⁼Egypt to·the ⁼month ⁼the ⁼fifth to·one of·the ⁼month

54 and you⁺·will·¬allot °the ⁼earth of·them in to·¬lot ¬according·to °¬tribes⁺ of·you⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼¬greater⁺ you⁺·will·¬multiply °the ⁼¬possession of·them and to·the⁺ ⁼¬lesser⁺ you⁺·will·¬make·less °the ⁼¬possession of·them to °which ifᵮ should·come·out the ⁼name of·him there of·him will·be·himself ¬according·to °¬tribes⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·you⁺ you⁺·will·¬inherit

34 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

2 ꜝ¬order·yourself to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and you·will·¬say unto °them you⁺ you⁺·¬enter·yourselves⁺ to °the ⁼earth of·¬Canaan this will·be·himself to·you⁺ to °¬inheritance earth of·¬Canaan wiŧh to·the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·her

3 and will·be·himself to·you⁺ the ⁼¬corner ⁼the·one unto °¬southwest off of·¬deserted Sin ¬until °self-having Edōm and will·be·himself to·you⁺ the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ unto °¬southwest off of·¬part of·the ⁼sea ⁼the ⁼¬salty off of·¬easts⁺

7 and this will·be·himself the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ to·you⁺ unto °north off of·the ⁼sea ⁼the ⁼great you⁺·will·¬measure·out to·you⁺ to·them ¬from °the ⁼mountain ⁼the ⁼mountain

8 and off of·the ⁼mountain °the ⁼mountain you⁺·will·¬measure·out to·them of·self-¬entering to Emath and will·be·himself the ⁼¬thoroughfare of·him °the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ Sarada

35 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh upon of·wests⁺ Mōab ¬from °the ⁼¬Jordan ¬according·to °¬Jericho saying

2 ꜝ¬direct to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and they·will·give to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ off of·the⁺ ⁼¬lots⁺ of·¬possession of·them °cities⁺ to·¬dwell and °the⁺ ⁼¬outskirtses⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ¬surrounding of·them they·will·give to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺

3 and they·will·be·themselves to·them the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ to·¬dwell and the⁺ ⁼¬separations⁺ of·them will·be·himself to·the⁺ ⁼¬animals⁺ of·them and to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼four-footed⁺ of·them

4 and °the⁺ ⁼¬falling·in·with of·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ °which⁺ you⁺·will·give to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ off of·wall of·the ⁼city and out °two·thousand⁺ ⁼¬cubits⁺ ¬surrounding

5 and you·will·¬measure out of·the ⁼city °the ⁼¬corner ⁼the·one unto °¬easts⁺ °two·thousand⁺ ⁼¬cubits⁺ and °the ⁼¬corner ⁼the·one unto °¬southwest °two·thousand⁺ ⁼¬cubits⁺ and °the ⁼¬corner ⁼the·one unto °sea °two·thousand⁺ ⁼¬cubits⁺ and °the ⁼¬corner ⁼the·one unto °north °two·thousand⁺ ⁼¬cubits⁺ and the ⁼city °middle of·this will·be·himself to·you⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬adjoining⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺

6 and °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ you⁺·will·give to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ °the·ones⁺ six °cities⁺ of·the⁺ ⁼¬place·of·refuges⁺ °which⁺ you⁺·will·give to·¬flee there to·the ⁼murdering and unto to·these⁺ forty and two °cities⁺

7 ⁼all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ you⁺·will·give to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺ forty and eight °cities⁺ ⁼these⁺ and °the⁺ ⁼¬outskirtses⁺ of·them

8 and °the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼which⁺ you⁺·will·give off of·the ⁼¬possession of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el off of·the·ones⁺ °the⁺ ⁼many⁺ ⁼many⁺ and off of·the⁺ ⁼¬lesser⁺ °¬lesser ¬each ¬according·to °the ⁼¬inheritance of·him °which they·will·¬inherit they·will·give off of·the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ to·the⁺ ⁼¬Levites⁺

9 and spoke lord unto °Mosheh saying

10 ꜝspeak to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and you·will·¬say unto °them you⁺ you⁺·¬cross °the ⁼¬Jordan to °earth of·¬Canaan

11 and you⁺·will·¬give·orders to·you⁺ to·them °cities⁺ ¬place·of·refuges⁺ will·be·himself to·you⁺ to·¬flee there °the ⁼¬man-killer all ⁼the ⁼¬striking °soul ¬unintentionally

12 and they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ to·you⁺ ¬place·of·refuges⁺ off of·¬·kin °the ⁼blood and not ńot should·die·off the ⁼murdering ¬until iᵮ should·stand ¬before of·the ⁼¬synagogue to °judgment

13 and the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ °which⁺ you⁺·will·give °the·ones⁺ six °cities⁺ ¬place·of·refuges⁺ they·will·be·themselves to·you⁺

14 °the⁺ ⁼three⁺ ⁼cities⁺ you⁺·will·give in to·the·one ¬other·side of·the ⁼¬Jordan and °the⁺ ⁼three⁺ ⁼cities⁺ you⁺·will·give in to·earth of·¬Canaan

15 ¬place·of·refuge will·be·himself to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and to·the ⁼¬proselyte and to·the ⁼¬foreigner ⁼the·one in to·you⁺ they·will·be·themselves the⁺ ⁼cities⁺ ⁼these⁺ to °¬place·of·refuge to·¬flee there to·all ⁼¬striking °soul ¬unintentionally

16 ifᵮ then in to·¬vessel of·iron should·¬strike °him and should·¬decease ¬man-killer is to·death ꜝlet·put·to·death·himself the ⁼¬man-killer

17 ifᵮ then in to·stone out of·hand in to·which will·die·off·himself in to·him should·¬strike °him and should·die·off ¬man-killer is to·death ꜝlet·put·to·death·himself the ⁼¬man-killer

18 ifᵮ then in to·¬vessel ⁼¬wooden out of·hand out of·which will·die·off·himself in to·him should·¬strike °him and should·die·off ¬man-killer is to·death ꜝlet·put·to·death·himself the ⁼¬man-killer

19 ⁼the ⁼¬·kin °the ⁼blood this will·kill·off °the ⁼murdering ¬when should·¬meet to·him this will·kill·off °him

20 ifᵮ then through °¬hostility should·¬thrust·through °him and should·¬throw·on upon °him °all ⁼¬vessel out of·¬hinderance and should·die·off

21 or through °¬vehement·anger ¬struck °him to·the ⁼hand and should·die·off to·death ꜝlet·put·to·death·himself the ⁼¬striking ⁼¬man-killer is to·death ꜝlet·put·to·death·himself the ⁼murdering ⁼the ⁼¬·kin °the ⁼blood will·kill·off °the ⁼murdering in to·the·one to·¬meet to·him

22 ifᵮ then ¬suddenly not through °¬hostility should·¬thrust·through °him or should·¬throw·on upon °him °all ⁼¬vessel not out of·¬hinderance

23 or to·all ⁼stone in to·which will·die·off·himself in to·him not having·¬seen and should·¬fall upon °him and should·die·off he then not ¬enemy of·him was not·then ¬seeking to·do·evil °him

24 and will·judge the ⁼¬synagogue ¬each °middle of·the ⁼¬striking and ¬each °middle of·the ⁼¬·kin °the ⁼blood ¬according·to °the⁺ ⁼judgments⁺ ⁼these⁺

25 and will·¬take·out·himself the ⁼¬synagogue °the ⁼murdering off of·the ⁼¬·kin °the ⁼blood and they·will·¬restore °him the ⁼¬synagogue to °the ⁼city of·the ⁼¬place·of·refuge of·him ¬whither ¬fled and will·¬dwell there ¬until iᵮ should·die·off the ⁼priest ⁼the ⁼great °which they·christened °him to·the ⁼¬olive·oil ⁼the ⁼holy

26 ifᵮ then to·¬departure should·come·out the ⁼murdering °the⁺ ⁼¬regions⁺ of·the ⁼city to °which ¬fled there

27 and should·find °him the ⁼¬·kin °the ⁼blood out of·the·ones⁺ of·¬regions⁺ of·the ⁼city ⁼¬refuge of·him and should·murder the ⁼¬·kin °the ⁼blood °the ⁼murdering not ¬liable·for is

28 in for to·the ⁼city of·the ⁼¬refuge ꜝlet·¬dwell ¬until iᵮ should·die·off the ⁼priest ⁼the ⁼great and with °the·one to·die·off °the ⁼priest ⁼the ⁼great will·be·¬returned the ⁼murdering to °the ⁼earth of·the ⁼¬possession of·him

29 and will·be·himself these⁺ to·you⁺ to °just·deed of·judgment to °the⁺ ⁼generations⁺ of·you⁺ in to·all⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬dwellings⁺ of·you⁺

30 all ⁼¬striking °soul through of·witnesses⁺ you·will·murder °the ⁼murdering and witness ⁼one not will·witness upon °soul to·die·off

31 and not you⁺·will·take·yourselves⁺ °¬ransoms⁺ about of·soul ¬from of·the ⁼murdering ⁼the ⁼¬liable·for ⁼being to·be·¬killed to·death for will·be·put·to·death

32 not you⁺·will·take·yourselves⁺ °¬ransoms⁺ of·the·one to·¬flee to °city of·the⁺ ⁼¬place·of·refuges⁺ of·the·one ¬again to·¬dwell upon of·the ⁼earth ¬until iᵮ should·die·off the ⁼priest ⁼the ⁼great

33 and not ńot you⁺·should·¬pollute·with·murder °the ⁼earth to °which you⁺ you⁺·¬dwell the·one for blood ⁼this ¬pollutes·with·murder °the ⁼earth and not will·be·¬appeased the ⁼earth off of·the ⁼blood ⁼the ⁼¬poured·out upon of·her but upon of·the ⁼blood ⁼the ⁼¬pouring·out

34 and not you⁺·will·¬stain °the ⁼earth upon of·which you⁺·¬dwell upon of·her upon of·which I* I·should·¬dwell in to·you⁺ I* for I·am lord ⁼¬dwelling in to·middle of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

36 and they·came·unto the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ of·¬tribe of·sons⁺ Galaad of·son Machir ⁼son ⁼¬Manasseh out of·the ⁼¬tribe of·sons⁺ of·Yosef and they·spoke ¬before of·Mosheh and ¬before of·¬Eleazar ⁼the ⁼priest and ¬before of·the⁺ ⁼¬rulers⁺ ⁼houses⁺ of·paternities⁺ of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

2 and they·told to·the ⁼lord of·us ¬ordered·himself lord to·¬pay °the ⁼earth of·the ⁼¬inheritance in to·¬lot to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and to·the ⁼lord ¬directed lord to·give °the ⁼¬inheritance Salpaad ⁼the ⁼brother of·us to·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ of·him

3 and they·will·be·themselves to·one of·the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el women⁺ and will·be·¬removed the ⁼¬lot of·them out of·the ⁼¬possession of·the⁺ ⁼fathers⁺ of·us and will·be·¬added to °¬inheritance of·the ⁼¬tribe to·which⁺ iᵮ they·should·be·generated·themselves women⁺ and out of·the ⁼¬lot of·the ⁼¬inheritance of·us will·be·¬removed

4 ifᵮ then should·be·generated·himself the ⁼¬forgiveness of·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el and will·be·¬added the ⁼¬inheritance of·them upon °the ⁼¬inheritance of·the ⁼¬tribe to·which⁺ iᵮ they·should·be·generated·themselves women⁺ and off of·the ⁼¬inheritance ⁼¬tribe ⁼paternity of·us will·be·¬removed the ⁼¬inheritance of·them

5 and ¬ordered·himself Mosheh to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el through of·¬order of·lord saying thus ¬tribe of·sons⁺ of·Yosef they·say

6 °this ⁼the ⁼¬declaration which ¬directed lord to·the⁺ ⁼daughters⁺ Salpaad saying ¬whither ¬pleases ¬in·front·of of·them ꜝlet·them·be⁺ women⁺ ¬but out of·the ⁼¬people ⁼the ⁼father of·them ꜝlet·them·be⁺ women⁺

7 and ¬not! will·be·¬moved·around ¬inheritance to·the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el off of·¬tribe upon °¬tribe ¬that ¬each in to·the ⁼¬inheritance of·the ⁼¬tribe ⁼the ⁼paternity of·him they·will·be·¬joined the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

8 and all ⁼daughter ⁼¬·kin °¬inheritance out of·the⁺ ⁼¬tribes⁺ of·sons⁺ of·Yisra’el to·one of·the·ones⁺ out of·the ⁼¬people ⁼the ⁼father of·her they·will·be·themselves women⁺ so·that they·should·¬be·kin the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el ¬each °the ⁼¬inheritance ⁼the ⁼¬paternal of·him

9 and not will·be·¬moved·around ¬lot out of·¬tribe upon °¬tribe ⁼óther but ¬each in to·the ⁼¬inheritance of·him they·will·be·¬joined the⁺ ⁼sons⁺ of·Yisra’el

10 °which ⁼¬way ¬directed lord to·Mosheh thus they·did daughters⁺ Salpaad

11 and they·were·generated·themselves Thersa and Egla and Melcha and Noua and Maala daughters⁺ Salpaad to·the⁺ ⁼¬cousins⁺ of·them

12 out of·the ⁼¬people ⁼the ⁼¬Manasseh of·sons⁺ of·Yosef they·were·been·generated women⁺ and was·generated·himself the ⁼¬inheritance of·them upon °the ⁼¬tribe of·¬people ⁼the ⁼father of·them

13 these⁺ ⁼the⁺ ⁼¬commandments⁺ and the⁺ ⁼just·deeds⁺ and the⁺ ⁼judgments⁺ °which⁺ ¬ordered·himself lord in to·hand of·Mosheh upon of·wests⁺ Mōab upon of·the ⁼¬Jordan ¬according·to °¬Jericho
